Reviews.Title: “What we expected/average beach hotel”
Reviews.Author: MissPinkTrouble
Reviews.Content: I would definitely stay at the Monte Carlo again. The rooms were clean, the rooms with the jacuzzi were really nice, the bed was comfortable and there was nothing to complain of. Great location very close to the boardwalk, and I definitely suggest paying the extra $20/day for preferred parking. This hotel is what I would expect of a "beach" hotel. There was a DVD player, flat screen TV, fridge, makeup remover wipes in the bathroom, and a microwave and plenty of space in the room. The outside pool was clean and definitely a nice way to cool off. I would recommend this hotel to anybody who isn't looking for anything fancy and top of the line. All that said - I think there could be a few very minor improvements. The upgrades they made in 2012 to the room furnishings were fabulous. However, I wish they would have upgraded the shower curtain in the bathrooms - it looks like $1.00 cheapee you pick up at a general store. The curtain itself is functional but I think something a little nicer looking would do wonders for the bathrooms. I know in our room the sticker on the fridge that indicates that the fridge is off for energy conservation was worn off making it nearly illegible. So I spent the first few minutes wondering why the fridge was warm until I was able to make out the sticker on the front. Those are really my only two suggestions. Otherwise we had a wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic labor day stay”
Reviews.Author: dontastical
Reviews.Content: Well our final trip to the ocean this season and the hotel once again didn't disappoint. Staff was friendly and clean rooms as always. This time they also did a movie showing of the hunger games poolside. Which was pretty great. I see some of these complaint reviews on here and think to myself theres just no pleasing everyone. Some people are miserable at home and seem to be taking that to the beach. Staff greeted us every time we walked by the desk. And even gave us some suggestions on some rainy day activities. It's a cute little beach place. If you like to enjoy the boardwalk and all it has this place is for you. The location can't be beat. If your already a mad bitter person I prob would advise just staying home. All the rooms are kinda new and contemporary. Parking is tight. But hey it is free.

Reviews.Title: “Never again!”
Reviews.Author: Phillip M
Reviews.Content: This hotel may of been the worst one we could of chosen! Pros: the lobby smells like subway, big plus! It has a rooftop pool It has a rooftop hot tub, this was clean and niceish Location, kind of you are one street down from the boardwalk but you are NOT on the boardwalk! Cons: Sand in the bed or something, I know others have said this but I assumed it was a one off item but that is not the case. This hotel clearly does not change their sheets regularly. Toilet was broke, I had to fix it multiple times myself because the back kept getting stuck so it would not fill up. One elevator that is slow as hell, the stairs are WAY faster. The parking: If parking could be any worse it would be clear off the island, nothing like driving around a place you do not know with vague instructions on where to park "its a block down". The Staff: it appears many of these people do not care about their guests and if you write a bad review on here they follow up with pure lies (I will be expecting one claiming we was kicked out, or re-booked, or tried to get a free room, neither of which we did, or ever will do). On top of all this I don't think they greeted us a single time when we went in or out. The door keys: some reason it took several tries to get them to work on occasion. This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in, between the terrible staff and living area, and the price (which was the final straw) I will never stay here again, and not recommend it to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: Redman6601
Reviews.Content: Spend the extra money and stay somewhere else. The hotel staff is very unprofessional. Even after telling them of our problems, the room smelling of mold and smoke, they did nothing to cure this. We ended up staying because they would not refund our money and that everywhere else was booked.

Reviews.Title: “roomy suites with comfy beds”
Reviews.Author: Jerry A
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hotel Monte Carlo Suites on 11th st. this weekend for three nights. I had mixed feelings about this hotel due to some good and bad reviews. Check in was quick and easy, staff was friendly. We did a thorough inspection of the room for bed bugs and were happy to find no evidence, they did have one of the beds covered with a protective cover. The room looked modern and clean at first glance. However, we found crumbs, dirt and sand on the mattress and inside of the pull out sofa. This was discouraging since we drove a long way and were very tired (it was after 11pm). We contacted staff right away and they apologized and offered another room, we did have to drive back down to the main hotel to get the key. We checked out the other room and the pull out couch was in the same condition and there was a strong musty smell in the room, so we decided to stay in our original room. In the morning, housekeeping came and rectified the problem by replacing the mattress on the sofa bed. I would have preferred they cleaned it and vacuumed again but it worked and they were very nice. The screen door on the patio was also broken when we arrived and someone came out to fix that the next day also. The rest of our stay was great, one short block to the boardwalk, the pool was right outside our door with an outdoor shower and the beds and pillows were extremely comfortable! There were plenty of extra pillows. Parking is tight but staff offered that parking is allowed in the handicapped space to accommodate all guests. We were on the second floor and did hear footsteps and some noise from the neighbors but nothing that we lost any sleep over. The balcony is great with two tables and four chairs, ours was overlooking the Philadelphia Ave. Housekeeping came daily to ask if we needed anything. There were two tv's, one in each room with lots of channels that kept my kids busy when needed. The rooms are separated by a small kitchen, stocked basically, and large bathroom with a jacuzzi tub. For my picky taste, I didn't want my family to use the tub since it didn't look like it was scrubbed but it was clean enough to shower in and very roomy. Overall, I think this suite was a great value for the money and we would probably stay here again. Hopefully management can rectify the issue with the sofa beds being cleaning by housekeeping and a more thorough cleaning of the entire room regarding dusting, vacuuming and scrubbing the bathtub (behind dressers also). Compared to other places we've stayed in Ocean City in the past, this place is probably the best value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “NOT TO BE SLEPT IN”
Reviews.Author: Koala B
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a place to store your bags while you hit the beach or boardwalk, the Monte Carlo is just the place for you. Otherwise, this hotel was one of the TRASHIEST holes in the wall that I've ever encountered. We walked into the room, and went back downstairs to check out. We originally booked for 3 nights, but we reloaded our car and high tailed it to the Clarion after seeing the room. Although we spent only a few minutes after checking in, the staff went "????????" when I came down to talk about a refund. I ended up only getting a refund for 2 nights--therefore I had to pay for 1 night. Im not griping about that, it does mention having to pay 1 night in their cancellation policy. Please see pictures, stay away from this hellhole. I wish someone had written this review before I sacrificed $170.00.

Reviews.Title: “Nicer than expected”
Reviews.Author: Tiffany G
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night with family. Our room was listed as a city view but when we went onto our balcony we had a very beautiful view of the bay and the ocean. The room was clean and I loved the colors. The walls were a creamy peach and a light greyish blue with dark chocolate furniture. It was very relaxing. I had never stayed here before so I was very worried about how the room would be but I was very happy with it. It is located near a good part of the boardwalk, has a nice rooftop area with a pool and jacuzzi and an area to just lounge. Front desk was nice. Inside pool was very small, it looked like people were just using it to wash sand off of them. There was only one elevator and it was very slow, but there are numerious locations for stairs if you choose to use them instead. Parking, isn't the greatest. It's across the street and another location for parking further down, if you are going to stay here I would recommend paying the twenty dollars for a reserved spot near the hotel. My only complaints about our room are the coffee pot was filled with water and coffee grounds and there was growth inside that showed it hadn't been cleaned out in at least a week. (however there are numerious places to buy coffee near by). Also on the back of the door in the hotel room it says the hotel is a smoke free hotel no smoking in or outside of the hotel. A man two rooms down kept smoking on his balcony, because of it I couldn't enjoy my balcony as much as I would have liked I called the front desk to say something about it and was informed it was okay to smoke on the balconies. If they are going to list themselves as a smoke free hotel they need to be a smoke free hotel. Other than those two things everything about our stay was great. I would definately stay here again and I would recommend it to those traveling down that way.

Reviews.Title: “Above average beach hotel room/property”
Reviews.Author: JoelH549
Reviews.Content: Keep in mind this place is one block from the beach just behind the boards on 3rd st. This is a great place to be if you like the business of the city, boardwalk, bars, beach, or any combination of these. We booked this property for the second time a week ago because it is nicer than most other hotels in that area. We wanted to be able to walk to a lot of bars and be within a few blocks of home base. The Hotel Monte Carlo fit perfectly. The room was still on the expensive side but a good value compared to others in the area. The room was clean and in good repair. King room with a jacuzzi tub by the bed. Nice balcony although it overlooks other hotels. Roof top pool was much nicer this year(only 3ft deep but big). It was not crowded and the breeze up there is nice when it's hot out. There is a tiny indoor pool that is open until midnight which is nice when you return to your room after a sweaty walk on the boards. The staff is nice and attentive. We enjoyed our stay very much and look forward to next year.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location with beautiful rooms to choose from...”
Reviews.Author: david_e_14
Reviews.Content: I never go to Ocean City, MD but this was a special occasion. The Hotel Monte Carlo caught my attention because of the way the room looked. It looked modern and clean. I was very happy with our stay there. The in room jacuzzi was an awesome addition to the room. The hotel sits very close to the beach, its basically ocean front. The parking situation can be a little disappointing. Also the hot tub on the roof was out of service during my stay which was unfortunate. The indoor pool was nice and warm. It was perfect due to the fact that the outside weather was a bit more chilly than expected and very breezy. I highly recommend this hotel. They were still undergoing some renovations during my stay so it may be even better now. Go check it out...

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: LisaB1966
Reviews.Content: We had a nice stay. Clean newly decorated room. Small fridge and microwve. Close to the boardwalk and the beach. Parking is terrible but so is almost every place in that area. The pool was having issues during the time that I was there but we went to the beach every day. Great family vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel & location”
Reviews.Author: Meowmixed
Reviews.Content: Not sure where some of the bad reviews are coming from. We stayed for three nights and had no problems whatsoever. The front desk staff was courteous and helpful and even the maintenance man was super friendly. Clean room, clean bed, clean bathroom and we loved that the jacuzzi was in the room instead of the bathroom. Parking was a little tricky but not a problem and the location was fantastic. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Always nice”
Reviews.Author: lisamshortt
Reviews.Content: Rooms have been updated nicely. Love the rooftop hot top and pool. We love the rooms with tubs although we have rented both happily. It is our prefered hotel and we go to oc alot our teen girls love the location so close to the boardwalk. Staff is nice and remembers us many times, (also gives us orioles games score because they have heard us talking about it) the one and only complaint I have is that the lobby and elevator smell of old subway subs because there is a subway store attached so not really hotels fault .....really like this place wish i could buy a time share here :)

Reviews.Title: “No Bed Bugs here”
Reviews.Author: dontastical
Reviews.Content: After reading these past few reviews was scared of checking into hotel. Asked front desk about the issue and they produced a document from local health dept that said there were no bed bugs. Apparently some jilted customer who wanted a refund began these postings. I can safely say no issues at all why we were there. Room was clean and staff was great. Parking was interesting at times but all in all with the price and all the things the hotel offered we are glad we stayed. I wish the people posting reviews like that would think what that kind of stuff does to families like mine who read it and how it made for alot of aniexty that was needless We will be back and I thank the staff for taking the time to address our concerns with us.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service”
Reviews.Author: Ruth C
Reviews.Content: I had a very favorable stay this past weekend. We stayed at the suites located between 11th and 12th street. The front desk staff were amazing and so friendly. We had a small probelm with our toilet flushing and when we called the front desk, they sent thier maintenance man over. He was friendly, explained what the problem was, switched out the problem part, and apologized for any inconvenience we may have incurred. He was a delight. We found our room very clean as well as the pool. I will be booking my next stay in Ocean City here.

Reviews.Title: “Cleanest hotel in Oc”
Reviews.Author: dontastical
Reviews.Content: Can't believe some of the other reviews I've read. This is our fourth time here and has always clean and great customer service. I'm not sure these other reviews slamming hotel are accurate. One day while exiting lobby i actually heard a guest tell the front desk if you don't refund my money I will post bad review on your hotel. Sounded more like blackmail to me. The staff at the front desk was very professional in dealing with the irate guest. Upon entering hotel we were greeted by the staff each and every time. This place isn't the Hilton but I stayed there once and can tell u I paid double only to have poor customer service. Since than we have always stayed at the hotel monte Carlo.

Reviews.Title: “Filthy filthy and filthy. Under couch bed was garbage and wasn't vaccuumed . We looked in mattresses and there were black specs ”
Reviews.Author: Masjsr
Reviews.Content: Filthy filthy and more filthy !!!!!!!! Don't stay here! We have three children and the place was so disgusting . Couch bed was gross. Garbage was under neath couch bed. Black specs were all over mattresses I'm assuming from fecal matter from bed bugs. We got a full refund . We had to get out of there! Thank god we looked at room first or else we would have been bringing home bed bugs i think! Check underneath mattresses before u commit to your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Phenomenal Stay!”
Reviews.Author: PandaMia
Reviews.Content: The Hotel Monte Carlo and it's staff get HUGE kudos from me and my husband! We had stayed there a few years ago, and had a nice stay, but this visit was even better as they have COMPLETLY redone all their rooms! This visit, we got a king size room (as last time, but), with a jacuzzi! Not only was the jacuzzi NOT in the bathroom--we could hang out in the main part of the room, while IN the jacuzzi, AND watch TV! It was a hot week in OCMD, so there were moments where we enjoyed the cool indoors, such as mentioned above. BUT, when we roamed outside, we got to enjoy the jacuzzi on the CLEAN hotel rooftop, as well as the sparkling waters of the rooftop pool! One evening, we were able to enjoy a movie at the pool area, compliments of the hotel! (another plus was having GREAT seats to watch the evening 's fireworks from the bay!) Some hotel guests had complaints of things that really weren't issues...my thinking is they just wanted a free stay...but all of their complaints were our applause to how well the hotel was run! It's a NON-SMOKING facility, so our room did NOT stink of stale smokers! And a non-smoking facility means no gross cigarettes butts everywhere! PLUS, they were LESS in price than the competitors all around! Brand new rooms, non-smoking facility, hotel wide wi-fi, kind and quick responding & knowledgable staff...OUR KIND OF PLACE!!!! All in all, I would TOTALLY suggest this hotel! It's close to the boardwalk, the beach, De Lazy Lizard, Fat Daddy's, and right outside is a bust stop, so EVERYTHING in Ocean City is just a short trip away! The Hotel Monte Carlo is DEFINITELY someplace we'll be staying on our next trip to OCMD! Thank you, all, for a sensational stay, a great trip, and in the end, RELAXATION!

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, great location in Ocean City.”
Reviews.Author: Manassas_VirginiaGlw
Reviews.Content: We found the staff friendly and helpful. I was worried that the room might be hot as it was over 100 degrees last week in Ocean City, but the AC worked great! The beds were very comfortable. Glad we were on the second floor so we could take the stairs, seems like there were always people in the lobby waiting for the elevator. This hotel is OK, we had a great time in OC and slept well at night.

Reviews.Title: “Old dinge, no customer service! Broken aminaties”
Reviews.Author: amberVacationTip
Reviews.Content: Fell from a broken steep into the pool. Scared to get stuck in the elivater it onlt worked half the time. No carts available to move bags to or from room. Housekeeping was the best. People were so nice.

Reviews.Title: “Always a good stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: bronzeindian
Reviews.Content: Went June 28th-30th. This was our 3rd time staying at the hotel, and the 1st since the renovations and remodeling of the hotel. As before, the location is PERFECT!!!! Boardwalk is just up the hill (very short distance) and is dead smack in the middle of all the attractions. The renovations gave the rooms sort of a Marriott feel than before. Before the rooms were a little dated but, what everyone doesnt seem to realize is that your paying for location. Nothing in Ocean City Maryland have Ritz Carlton qualities. If you're looking for that, then your sadly mistaken. All the places that are down there are hotel/motel quality. And Hotel Monte Carlo is hotel quality. If you're looking for a great afforable place in a prime location, Monte Carlo is it!!! Did I mention that returning guest receive a discount on their future stays????

Reviews.Title: “Okay Hotel; Poorly Run”
Reviews.Author: Net212
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel last week for vacation. I was prepared for poor management especially after reading the manager's responses to negatively written reviews on this site. The hotel is just off the Boardwalk which is good. The street view really is just a view of the street, there is another hotel blocking any glimpses of the ocean. There is also a bar at the Plim Plaza that plays music pretty loudly on a daily basis so if you're staying street side be aware of the noise. The location is great, easy access to the beach and Boardwalk so it has that going for it. The lobby is extremely small. It's really just the office however, you need to walk through it to get to your room. There is only one elevator which wasn't too bad because the hotel wasn't crowded however, around 2 or 3 in the afternoon there was always a line since that was when check in time was. The manager seems kind of cheap. We noticed that there is a very minimal amount of staff, perhaps why people's rooms don't get clean and if you needed something there was a good chance they couldn't help you. The maid service was never prompt. We left the room extremely early a lot of the days and would put the "maid service" sign up but would return a few hours later to see that the maid was still working at the other end. We noticed one man who was an employee at the hotel who was extremely rude to customers. I was in the elevator with him a few times and when people got on the elevator with sand on their feet he'd start talking about the audacity of them coming into the hotel with sand on their feet and that they should have to clean it up. This was after they left which made me really paranoid he would talk about me after I left. Overall, this hotel is no frills and absolutely nothing special. If you stay here be prepared for poor management and a lack of hospitality. It's basically just a place to go and sleep in, nothing more. You get what you pay for, nothing above that.

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay”
Reviews.Author: dontastical
Reviews.Content: Another fantastic stay at my fave ocean city hotel. Location is just off boardwalk. We didnt move the car the entire time we were there. With a couple of kids loading and unloading the car can be a hassle sometimes but the monte carlos location downtown ocean side is the main reason we stay there everytime we come go to Oc. Rooms are very new and clean. Can't beat the prices for all u get including muffin and juice breakfast daily. Staff an mgmt have always been great.

Reviews.Title: “worst management ever”
Reviews.Author: 151coreyt151
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with the hotel management. The Manager of the hotel was rude and very unprofessional. Our room did not get cleaned which was no big deal but the next day, I went to the front desk to ask them if they could please make sure the room would be cleaned this time and the MANAGER told me that I needed to find the house cleaners and tell them myself. What kind of hotel says that to a guest? Secondly, they did not put enough towels in the room so I called down to the front desk to ask for some more towels and I was told that if I wanted towels, I had to come get them myself and that they would not bring them to our room. The management made what could have been am ok hotel horrible to stay at. I travel about 150 days out of the year and so I know what to expect from a Hotel service and this is the worst experience I have had to date. Now to show you that I am not just pissed off, I will let you know that the location was great. The rooms, when cleaned, were clean. The shower had no water pressure and the fridge had a bad smell inside. The overall experince would have been rated as average if I was not disappointed in the staff.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for the most part”
Reviews.Author: BrittanyZ
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel this past weekend. Upon arrival, we were told that we each needed to have a $75 security deposit that would be returned to us later after first taking $10 out of each for cleaning purposes. This was because we were under the age of 25, but we were not there for senior week purposes (We are 23). We weren't told of this over the phone in advance, so we had to run to an ATM and get CASH for the deposit. We ended up getting the money back at the end of our stay after waiting 20 minutes for them to check our room. Besides that, the stay was good. The room was nice. We had a king bed one on the second floor. Bed was comfortable, shower pressure was good. Housekeeping was quite nice as well and made sure we had fresh linens daily and made our bed. The garbage truck Comes at about 5:30AM each morning, so be prepared to be woken up. The location was great. Not ocean front, but was a short wall out the door. Wish there was another entrance besides the one in the lobby. Overall, not too bad and a good price.

Reviews.Title: “Future brides beware”
Reviews.Author: travellingtator
Reviews.Content: My mother and I attended the ocean city bridal show because my fiance and I want to have our wedding in Ocean City in September 2013. A representative from the Monte Carlo was there with pictures of the rooms and the roof top pool. My mom and I were excited because it seemed the perfect place to hold our reception. We went to the hotel and check out a couple of rooms and the roof top pool. We've been trying to contact the hotel for the last 3 weeks to try to book the pool and a bunch of rooms for our wedding (we all will be travelling from out of town). The manager is always unavailable and he doesn't call or e-mail back. To top it all off, I guess the front desk was tired of us calling because I was hung up on. This was the final straw. They advertised something that they obviously don't want to offer, and i'll find somewhere else with better customer service to spend my money.

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad”
Reviews.Author: Lynn B
Reviews.Content: My family and I just came back from a 2 night stay at the Monte Carlo. Some of these reviews are misleading. Yes, you do smell bread baking while on elevator, but, who could complain about that? The lobby is smaller than what I am used to and the staff was wonderful. The bathroom was too small for my taste, so I gave the room average rating. You open the bathroom door and the toilet is right there. If someone opened the door while you were in there, it would smack you in the kneecaps. ha.. The room was clean. Not a fancy place, but, a place to sleep.The indoor pool was ok for my youngest to play in while in rained Tthe bed was good, not too hard or too soft. The only real inconvience was the parking. You have to park across the street and walk. It was good for a short trip. We had a pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Updated, super clean, good size rooms”
Reviews.Author: Patricia B
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here over the recent weekend. From the moment we checked in with the exceptionally friendly and attentive front desk staff up until check out every thing was perfect. The rooms are very nice, they are a good size, the furniture and beds appeared new, the beds are extremely comfortable. The room was very clean. If I had anything negative to say it would be that I wish the indoor pool was a little larger, but this did not in anyway negatively impact our stay. I will definately choose Hotel Monte Carlo again and hope to do so in season when the rooftop pool is open as this looked very nice!

Reviews.Title: “best boutique hotel I've ever been to”
Reviews.Author: dontastical
Reviews.Content: stayed this past weekend. hotel was sold out and very busy with cheerleaders. staff was friendly and accommodating. the newly decorated rooms were very contemporary. stayed at a lot of oc hotels. This was the best by far.

Reviews.Title: “Best oc hotel by far”
Reviews.Author: Surfingjets
Reviews.Content: Very clean family friendly hotel. Hotel was located just off boardwalk in downtown ocean city so everything was within walking distance. Hotel rooms were updated and nice flat panel tvs. Will def stay again

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT GO HERE”
Reviews.Author: susan b
Reviews.Content: This hotel is awful and the staff is terrible and are not helpful. There are better hotels in the area that are of quality! Do not waste your money!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Cleanest hotel in ocean city”
Reviews.Author: Steelersfan75
Reviews.Content: Last year stayed at a large ocean front propert that was dirty. This year stayed at the hotel monte carlo on 2nd st. And what a great surprise. Staff was very helpful. But the room itself was very clean and spacious. Could t believe last year we spent double on a peppery that was so dirty and this year spent alot less and got a much higher quality hotel. Go figure! Outdoor pool and hot tub on roof deck were fantastic. Indoor pool a little small but just right size for the kids to splash around in. They also offered muffins and juice in the morning which was great with the group we had with us. Location on the boardwalk doesn't get any better. We will be back. !

Reviews.Title: “woke up to bedbugs!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kimberly m
Reviews.Content: What an awful experince we had here. I was completely disgusted when i awoke at 4 am to change my 5 month old daughters diaper. I laid her on the spare bed and as i was changing her, i looked and saw these little bugs crawling on the bed.. i picked her up so fast and immediately woke my boyfriend up and told him that we have to get outta here.He thought i was nuts til he got up and saw them for himself. He then googled them on his phone and saw that thats what they were. We pulled our sheets down in the bed we were in to find blood spots all over the sheets, at this point, i was already packed up and he was on his way to get the car. By this time it was almost 5 am and we are driving around ocean city wasting time til we can get in to the hotel to talk to a manager. Needless to say, the owner/manager was the biggest jerk ever and would absolutely not refund our money until the "inspector" came and verified that they were definitley bedbugs. So i called the chamber of commerce who directed me to the board of health, who i believe went out to inspect..sure enough, we got our money back, it took two days but we got it back!! Do not waste your time here, it isnot worth it. The manager actually even said himself, "if i gave everybody their money back that complained, i'd be out of business." what does that tell you?? We were even willing to suck up that nites stay but we had already paid for the next 3 nites..all we wanted was the money back for the next 3 nites,hewasnt even budging at all!! Terrible customer service if you ask me!!! We were not giving up til we got our money back.

Reviews.Title: “Not a clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: ashyden
Reviews.Content: Stayed just over night. The bathroom was filthy. Looked like dried vomit on the back of the bathroom door. Beds were uncomfortable. The bill statement noted that there were showers and bathroom facilities to use after you check out. Couldn't find them anywhere. Not a good experience. Very dissatisfied. Will not choose them again.

Reviews.Title: “Worst travel experience ever.”
Reviews.Author: Vale19008
Reviews.Content: I was looking forward to trip to oc very much. That was until I saw where we were staying. I have stayed in alot of motel/hotel room over last several years but I can honestly say none have compared to this. The first thing u notice when u walk in is the smell of the lobby, it is disgusting, then the service at front desk, they only speak to u if really necessary. Taking the elevator or stairs are equally as disgusting with the dirt and smell. The rooms are nothing like the website. We booked a queen or king size bed and ended up with a full. The room and smell and uncomfortable. We were booked to stay 2 nites but ended up leaving after one because it was to uncomfortable to stay not to mention the noise that comes from the bar across the car park that lasts well into the nite. Overall it was worst weekend break ever.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE IT!”
Reviews.Author: Sunsation22
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I are currently at this hotel and we LOVE IT! This will be our third night here, we were initially only planning on staying for two nights but it was so nice we decided to stay longer. The location of this hotel is great, the staff has been great, and the pools are both nice. They aren't big but they're very comfortable and not too crowded! Walking distance to great restaurants and right near the boardwalk. Great hotel for the price! Staying in a King room, city view. Bed is comfortable and room is clean. Only complaint is the live music at the pool a few hotels down gets annoying. Parking is right across the street and there is an overflow lot a mere 2 blocks away... very close and very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “bike week”
Reviews.Author: wendy c
Reviews.Content: poor parking for bikes.... was not organized and threatened to tow the bikes because they wanted parking for cars in spaces that weren't marked.... won't be returning!

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay again!”
Reviews.Author: Lizzynyu
Reviews.Content: We just came back from a family vacation and stayed at the Hotel Monte Carlo. We've been to Ocean City a few times and this is our first time staying there. The hotel staff was very friendly and accomodating since the moment we arrived. The hotel was very clean and the room was a very nice size for the price. The boardwalk and beach were less than a minute away. The pool was very nice although there should be a bathroom up there. We didn't try the continental breakfast but we heard it wasn't much. But you couldn't beat the price considering where the hotel was located. We will definitely be going back next summer!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: travelnuts2010
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a family vacation to Ocean City, Maryland where we stayed at the Monte Carlo. Hotel is a 30 second walk to the boardwalk, a must see in Ocean City. The beach is just beyond the boardwalk. I was worried I would not like the beach in Ocean City as I grew up visiting the gulf in Florida with sugar white sands. I was so pleasantly surprised! I loved everything about Ocean City. Such a cute, east coast beach town!! Our room at the Monte Carlo was huge! With two queen beds and a sleeper sofa, there was pleanty of room for the 5 of us. However, the sleeper sofa was very uncomfortable. We took extra comforters from the other beds to create extra padding. The room was very clean and we really enjoyed the balcony too. The hotel only has one elevator, which takes forever on a busy weekend. You're better off taking the stairs. The morning breakfast consisted of oranges and pre-packaged muffins. We started skipping that and visited the local Dunkin' Donuts. We thought the rooftop pool and hot tub was great, beautiful views of the ocean and the bay. For the price and the location of the Monte Carlo, you can't go wrong! We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Excellent location, Great price….”
Reviews.Author: ksabia713
Reviews.Content: I’ve been coming to Ocean city for a few years now; this was my first time staying at this hotel. We stayed at the 3rd street hotel. It’s a great location, close to all the rides and the beach, and since it’s a block away from the boardwalk it was nice a quiet. They had an EXCELLENT staff, very friendly, very helpful. My son spilt a drink on the bed; I called the front desk and got new sheets in minutes. My son lost his shoe, they found it for me. When we checked out of the hotel, a few minutes later I got a call that we left a camera in our room, I thought it was so nice that they called me, I don’t know that another place would have done that. The pool was clean, the room was always clean. I thought it was a great place, for the price that we paid. Their continental breakfast needs some work, but we plan to go back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Very poor hotel with terrible staff at front desk”
Reviews.Author: 1sydneysmom
Reviews.Content: Do not stay at this hotel! BIG waste of money! Pics looked great online, but doesnt even look like same hotel! Paint chipping off wall, floor boards sticking out further than wall, tub was dirty,outside pool was filthy &small! Front desk was very rude when asking for a refund & didnt grant our money back! I wouldnt ever, ever stay here again! Do not waste ur time or money! What a waste!

Reviews.Title: “close2evrything...loved it!”
Reviews.Author: kimnpgh
Reviews.Content: block from boardwalk, not crowded by hotels. we stayed in oceanview room&had church across from us&town hall on cornor. gave us great views of ocean&bay. great value too. only con kids had was they wished wifi was stronger in our room. strongest signal they got was 1bar(using 4th gen. ipod touch) hudled by the door lmao.

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: bnfdms
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the monte carlo with my girlfriend and my friend and his girlfriend. The experience started off rocky with the front desk check in. The lady was not very friendly unlike the other guy who was there. Then she told us there was a 100 dollar per person security desposit we had to pay. She said it was on the website but we never saw it. It also had to be cash. Needless to say we barely had four hundred in cash to give to them. It was just a big mess. Then we got up to the room it was cleanish. There was a booger on the wall and there were some stains on the linen n wall. Also when you went to the bathroom it reeked of pee. I thought it was just me but my other roomates smelled it too. When room service did come in. They did the bare minimum. Made the bed and changed the towels and left. Besides check in they were very friendly and very happy to explain the hidden fees. Parking is a mess like everyone says so i didnt move my car i walked everywhere. Overall this hotel was average to below average. Prices werent high but werent low either. Probably will never stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “If you are a family with small kids...please read "The Suites"”
Reviews.Author: ineedtolearntosayno
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a 6 night stay at the monte carlo suite on 12th street on OC. Lets start with the cons first. 1) The staff who work the front desk(esp. the foreign ones) have no idea how to communicate. One of them kept telling me she was new which was really not my problem. The washer and dryer I THINK was broken, depending on who you talked to. AT BOTH hotels. Their was of dealing with it was to tell you there was a public laundry on 8th street. We learned after we put our money in that it was broken because there is no sign. The housekeeper told us they had been broken for at least three weeks. When calling the location on 3rd they would tell you they didnt know it was broken. Every person we talked to told us a different story. Just put an out of order sign on it. And if it is that easy to take four kids to walk 4 blocks to wait an hour for it to be done...maybe they should try it once. Don't even ask for a manager because anytime you need him he either has left for the day or off the following day.... 2) we thought the suites would be a family place...sleeps 8...perfect if you are traveling with kids...well....also perfect if you are 18 and can split the cost 8 ways...the hotel has no lobby, so there are no employees there, they give you a code to get in the door which can be passed around very easily. So if you like swimming in the pool area with the morning after contraseptive boxes laying around, and if you like getting ice thrown at you from the balconies and enjoy not sleeping because they are still partying at 3am, than it might be the place for you. Cig bud everywhere in the non smoking hotel and beer cans everywhere... Dont get me wrong the week was fine and we didnt have any problems until the weekend rolled around. But it came with a bang and ruined the last part of our trip. 3) We booked early. In Jan to come in June. BIG MISTAKE!!!!! They were offering the same room at 120 less a night than what we paid for it because they were trying to get the rooms filled. 6 nights at 120 less...you can do the math.. When I called, the foreign girl whom I mentioned earlier told me I should have considered it lucky they even had a room when we booked it and when I asked to speak to the mgr...guess what, he wasn't there. So serioulsy wait until about a week before you go..the vacancy sign was lit the entire time we were there....They wont refund your deposit unless it is longer than ten days before your arrival...so I guess book, and 11 days before you go cancel and odds are they will have a room a lot cheaper...720 cheaper to be exact. 4) the location was a great to walk to the beach and boardwalk, but again there were a ton of abnoxious kids and they just ruined everything... 5) the pool they had was beautiful but it was covered and FREEZING!!!! No one was ever in it...wonder why??? The Pros.. 1) the room was beautiful. Very spacious. Held 4 adults and 4 kids very well. The heated water was shocking! Never have I stayed in a hotel where 8 showers can be taken and not run out of warm water. Comfy beds. Jet tub. Deck had two tables and enought chairs. 2) the housekeeping gave us all the towel and washclothes we asked for. And althought we didnt request the service everyday, he was very nice and polite to us and always told us hello. 3)Easy access to the beach and boardwalk. It really is a shame this hotel is in the location it was. I have been to OC many many times over the years and usually stay further down the boardwalk. The teenage/college age kids there just really ruined it for us to the point where we might try going somewhere else. I'm not sure if it was the location or the time of year we went. We have gone this week for the last four years and never remember so many younger disrespectful kids. The location and cost of this location had to play a role! Overall the hotel was very nice but I would NEVER stay there again. They need to kick out the kids and get some staff to maintain the chaos there a little better. If I rated based on the kids, I would had given it a 1 but really the hotel is beautiful. And based on the look of the room I would give it a high rating. But who wants to spend 2200 to sleep in a beautiful room next to teenage kids who paid a lot less and are disrespectful...

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money, will never return.”
Reviews.Author: mkcheer
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel because it was close to the inlet for our daughter's soccer tournament. What a mistake! There is "free parking" but it is across the street or 3 blocks away, you could pay $20/day for onsite parking. There is only one elevator in the hotel which was always busy and dirty. The hotel room appeared clean, but was clearly the minimum. Our room has 2 double beds, which seemed like the smallest double bed ever. It made me wonder if they had any queen beds, as none of our friends got queen beds, even though they advertised double/queen on my reservation. Sheets were coarse and the comforters were disgusting with burn holes in them. The towels were extremely cheap, and they made a note of saying "do not remove makeup with towels, if it is soiled, there will be a $3/towel charge." The towels weren't worth $1, let' alone $3. There were no icea machines (because they had fridges), but you could buy ice. Again, it seemed as though they were nickle and diming you. When we arrived the AC and fridge were off (to conserve energey), which seemed OK, but the AC unit could NOT keep the room cool, despite it being on high the entire stay. The hot tub was dirty and I didn't even want to change going in. The outdoor pool was nice, but the "indoor" pool was so microscopic small, I mistook it for the hot tub. What a joke. The staff were friendly, but honestly, it didn't matter. I paid $240/night on the weekend and friends paid $100 less per night for a nicer hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly Staff, Fun”
Reviews.Author: 28poole
Reviews.Content: I had read a few of the negative reviews and the price was one of the best in the city, so I was a bit hesitant to stay here. I have to say that I'm very glad that I did, and my wife, daughter and I will definitely stay there again. The rooms and common places were clean, the front desk staff was friendly and attentive, and there were 2 pools, which proved to be a very useful. From the beds to the bathroom, the room was very clean and nice. The front desk staff was always very polite with us, and one young lady proved to be very polite and composed when an irrationally upset guest screamed at her saying that she "had lost sleep" over the parking situation. To address that, the spaces/lot easily fit my full size Dodge Caravan with no problem and the lot was literally 30 feet from the hotel. Unfortunately, it sounds like another guest must have damaged her car, which I firmly believe the hotel cannot fix unless they provide free parking lessons with every stay. There are also VIP spaces that we chose not to pay extra for. The roof top pool was great, but my 18-month old and I were cold due to the windy conditions. In response, we just headed downstairs to the indoor pool, which was nice and warm. All-in-all, I feel like we had a 3-4 star experience for a 1 star price. Thank you again for a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden issues”
Reviews.Author: Sweetlyaimless
Reviews.Content: First off the hotel is clean and neat. We did not have any problems with it. However after booking on hotels.com, and paying a decently high rate, when we checked in we still "owed" a resort fee. Which actually added up quite quickly. I still don't think that's quite right and will be an issue I'll call hotels.com on. Secondly parking is awful. When ww checked in we were told there were two parking lots. One across the street and another 8 blocks down. Well after parking at the further away one we discovered it was "preferred" parking and will be towed with out that special pass. So your options are try to find parking across the street in the total 20 spaces or pay the extra 20 bucks to park further away. There might be another lot, but as of now we haven't found it. Overall the hotel was nice and if you want to be steps away from the boardwalk it's great. Just expect to pay a lot of extra fees. Oh ya and there is no ice. Which is just weird. :)

Reviews.Title: “It was just a plesanr stay.”
Reviews.Author: paintlover77
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean. The service was great. I can't'wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay AGAIN !!!! Always a pleasure to go to this hotel !! )”
Reviews.Author: mrcards58
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for most of the week again this year. We try to visit Ocean City at least once a year and have been coming down the week of our anniversary - which is the week between the car show and memorial day. As usual, we booked the room with a king bed, jacuzzi.... and we had a great room once again. The rooms are great value and only having to walk out the front door and around the side of the building to be on the boardwalk is fantastic. I always park in the lot directly across the street and save the $20 a day fee that is charged to park under the hotel - I have never had a problem. Rooms are clean....staff is friendly.... and we always get a great discount by booking online directly from their website. If there are ever any problems during our stay - the staff resolves them immediately and considerately. Nice pool, hot tub and picnic area on the rooftop as well.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value and Great Location”
Reviews.Author: bronzeindian
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd time staying at the Monte Carlo. I've noticed a lot of mixed reviews about this hotel and was very surprised. I am sure that those who have encountered problems during their stay may have happened, but for the most part this hotel is nice! Now if you are a person looking for Ritz Carlton quality at ANY ocean/beach hotel or motel, well, you will never find it at ANY of the properties located in Ocean City Maryland! But if you are looking for a good/great value hotel that is clean, has the basic amenities, a pleasant staff and that is centrally located right smack in the middle of the action spots on the boardwalk then the Monte Carlo Hotel is for you. If it was all that horrible the 1st time we went, we would have never came back to stay for a 2nd time.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Value EVER!”
Reviews.Author: DCBBW
Reviews.Content: This was my second year staying at the Hotel Monte Carlo and I was not disappointed again. For the prices they offer, you are wondering what is the catch, but it is wonderfully located, large spaciious rooms that were very clean and I love the indoor pool. THIS is my hotel of choice for my OC vacations.

Reviews.Title: “Very Vanilla”
Reviews.Author: cindycPasadena_MD
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hotel Monte Carlo this past weekend. The hotel staff was extremely friendly and the room was clean. Don't go by the hotel website because it makes it look more upscale that it actually is. Very vanilla. The room has the basics but no more. Standard beds, standard bath and a small kitchenette. Some suggestions that I would make to bring it up to par with other basic oc hotels are: furnish icebuckets and ice for the rooms ( we were told to make ice in our freezer w/ the ice tray however they only provided one tray that was very very small. we were also told that we could buy bagged ice at the local 7-11 however that would never fit in the freezer), need a hook in the bathroom to hang wet bathing suit, need some kind of glass or paper cups on the room( we had to go down to the desk to ask for cups and they asked if 2 was ok, i asked for 4 and that was ok. they acted like they were rationing them per room ) and the chairs on the balcony need a major upgrade- very uncomfortable. The indoor pool was about the size of a large hot tub. More than 5 people and it would be crowded. The parking was quite unique as they had about 8 spaces under cover and just outside the lobby not including the handicap spaces. The rest of the spaces were across the street which is not unusual for OC hotels. However, if you wanted to park in the spots undercover ( not including handicap) you were required to pay an extra $20.00 per night to park there. I have never heard of a parking fee at any hotel in OC except this one. The handicap and parking across the street was free. Would I stay here again? Probably not. MY husband and I like something that is not so vanilla. All in all the stay was great but the hotel is not our cup of tea.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for off season visit.”
Reviews.Author: Wiestling
Reviews.Content: Staff was helpful and friendly. Rooms very clean and comfortable. Location ideal for downtown. Only thing better would be oceanfront.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great rooms, great value, great location”
Reviews.Author: bnj102106
Reviews.Content: The hotel was right on the boardwalk and had a great view of the ocean. The people at the counter very friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean. We always stay at this hotel when visiting ocean city. Its such a great deal and such a nice place.

Reviews.Title: “The value can't be beat”
Reviews.Author: krisnjay
Reviews.Content: The guys at the front desk were always friendly. We even had a mix up with the rooms which was completely our fault and they cleared it up quickly. One of them even gave me advice on where to eat and didnt do me wrong. The room was large and had plenty of amenities. It is located right on the boardwalk and is right in the middle of everything. The room was very clean.

Reviews.Title: “What a nightmare!!!!!!!!!!!! Renter beware..................”
Reviews.Author: frankg2813
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at this hotel and what a surprise we got. the first night when we pulled back the bed covers the sheets had sand all over them so we slept on the comforter the first night. When we went the next morning and told the manager he acted surprised that there was sand in a supposedly clean room and made the comment that no one even is going to the beach??????????? Not my problem..............It led me to believe the room was never clean before we were rented the room so he sent up a cleaning lady to put on new bed linens while we were out. Upon returning my fiance' laid down to take a nap and when she woke up she put her feet down to get out of bed and cut the back of her foot on a piece of glass and put a one inch cut on the back of her foot. She then picked up two pieces of glass and we took it down to the manager. The boy behind the desk spoke to the manager on the phone and he came back and acted as if we planned this out. We went back up to the room and looked under the bed to find more glass there and behind the dresser, we then called back down to front desk and told him to come back up. He came up and we showed him the glass, his response was we have 15 minutes to vacate the premises and he will refund that night stay. We have traveled all over the U.S. and outside our country as well, and have NEVER experienced this before. We then drove around to find a new room for the night, We are very disappointed in the stay and the way it was handled. We have pictures and the bloody glass. We appreciate a quick response thank you

Reviews.Title: “Worst customer service ever encountered!”
Reviews.Author: evenparalan
Reviews.Content: I had to cancel my reservation because we were trapped in a different state due to 14 inches of snow falling over night. Non-emergency travel was prohibited. When I called the Monte Carlo of Ocean City, MD, and talked to the manager, the following statements were told to me: (1) You're lucky I even wasted 15 minutes on the phone with you, (2) No refund for you! EVER! then the manager hung up on me.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: fdsmith
Reviews.Content: First of all, this hotel pays guests $25 to write good reviews. They refund their credit card after a guest posts a good review. If you have a problem don't expect to talk to anyone that can actually do anything about it...the manager, Don, is always unavailable. This place cares nothing about customer service. This place seems terribly mismanaged. They seem to think since it''s a vacation spot that they'll book rooms whether or not you enjoyed your stay. Overpriced and poorly managed. I will never stay there again and would never recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: “Very convienent, just perfect”
Reviews.Author: pilchard3
Reviews.Content: This was our families first vacation together ever--and we had a really great time. The hotel was clean and very close to the boardwalk--just one block--the rooftop pool was perfect for the kids and the staff was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great for family with small children.”
Reviews.Author: Jill052204
Reviews.Content: My Husband booked the suites on 11th st for the dates of Sept 27- 30th. We enjoyed our stay. We had a suite with 2 double beds and a king size bed and a sleeper sofa. Our bathroom was huge we believe it was a handicap access. The full frig and 2 burner stove and microwave were great. The downside was we didn't have a strainer. Being within walking distance of the boardwalk with a 5yr old and a 3yr old was very helpful. We definiley will try to stay here the next time we visit OCMD.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel - Awesome Location”
Reviews.Author: Nora8Nitin
Reviews.Content: Our experience at the Monte Carlo Hotel was wonderful. Our stay was 8/28 - 8/30. It's a great hotel and very affordable. The staff was very helpful and pleasant. They helped with recommendation on restaurants and day activities. We were warned about parking before we got there, but parking was no problem at all. The front desk gave us a parking pass where we left our car the whole weekend with easy access to it if necessary. The location of the hotel was perfect! Just a block away from the boardwalk. I would recommend this hotel to all my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location for the money”
Reviews.Author: hurley8792
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I chose this hotel cause our vacation was a last-minute plan, and the hotel monte carlo was one of the only hotels in the area we wanted to stay at, so our choice of hotels was kinda last minute, however it was indeed a good choice for sure. The check in process was easy, parking was at 1 of 3 lots which the farthest was approx 1 city block away and not considered far at all in my opinion. The rooms were clean, the cleaning service was neat and fast, and the hotel seemed to be decorated very nicely. To be picky if you wanted to be were two small noticable problems; that i could really find we're that there was a slight chlorine smell hindering form the indoor pool, but nothing out of the ordinary considering its location. the other problem was the elevator, which there is only one and it can seem like its taking forever and sometimes the stairs (which the top level is only at floor 6) would be the faster more reliable mode of exiting or entering the hotel. But other than that it was in a great location, with friendly staff, and at moderately reasonably rates for a nights stay, especially if you can book and get the discounts online. I would recommend this hotel as a good leisure weekly stay and will be back if i decide ocean city, md is we're my next vacation spot is.

Reviews.Title: “OCEAN CITY FAVORITE”
Reviews.Author: diehlam
Reviews.Content: We vacation down in ocmd two to three times a year and every year but one we stayed at hotel monte carlo. we stay there for vacation and wine on the beach and love it, its not ocean front but good location for boardwalk and not as expensive as the boardwalk hotels. staff is helpful and gets you want you need if you dont have it. its a clean hotel and over all just a great place, HOTEL MONTE CARLO is where we stay and where we would recommend. check it out yourself!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect suite to stay with your friends and loved one”
Reviews.Author: SHAZZY1125
Reviews.Content: The staff was very nice at check in and since we were there early, they even got our room ready one hour before check in. We got to the place and it was spotless and gorgeous. That was my second time staying there because i liked it so much last year. It is very roomy and nice. I will stay there everytime i visit Ocean City MD, because the two years in a row i chose it, they did not disappoint us!

Reviews.Title: “Best room in the Best location!!”
Reviews.Author: MORG016
Reviews.Content: So glad I walked into the Hotel Monte Carlo on 3rd St. Its location is right on the boardwalk, right in the middle of every place I wanted to go. The price was ideal for a 2night stay (unlike any other hotel on the boardwalk) Our room was awesome! It had a Jacuzzi Tub right in the bedroom! (not the bathroom) With great lighting we had a romantic bubble bath. When we got hungry in the middle of the night, SUBWAY was inside the building open till 4am! The front staff were so real with me and super friendly. My boyfriend and I had such a pleasant time were coming back in ONE MONTH! hoping for the same room! see for yourself what Hotel Monte Carlo has to offer!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: FirstMMarylandVisit
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Suites on 12th St. We selected this hotel based on a number of factors, one important being WiFi(internet). Internet was not available when we checked in and we were told they were working on it - for three days! On the third day we went to the main hotel (there is no staff available at the 12th street location) and were told the manager Don would contact us. He never did. Hours later we went to the hotel to wait for Don and his response was that that internet service is a free service that guests do not pay for and if we did not like not having internet service we could check out! VERY POOR Customer service. Guest were not told that there was no internet service when checking in to the Hotel and were told they were "working on it" when we called. Don told us it was a Verizon problem and they had no idea when service would be restored. He also told us that we should complain to Verizon. I would NEVER stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “High standards? don't stay at Monte Carlo”
Reviews.Author: lucygirl17
Reviews.Content: The pictures you see on the internet are not what you get. The room was ok and the beds comfortable. The place is old and needs refurbishing. Bathroom floor was dirty, especially around toilet. I took tissues and wiped around toilet bottom and got black soot all over tissues. They just run a wet mop around the floor to clean it. Areas around bathroom door and tub were rusting. Our door to room scraped the floor when we opened or shut it. Our phone did not work. Someone came to fix phone and could not repair it. Staff was friendly. One elevator that was very busy and slow. Parking spaces very close to one another in each of their 3 lots. Very tight! Our daughter and children stayed in another room. When they checked in, their door would not close unless you slammed it hard. Called about this and they did send someone to fix it. Wrong screws holding spring hinge on. Repair was successful. Very noisey front of hotel as it is on main street and you hear the traffic all night. Great location, but you have to be prepared to hear late night visitors of the boardwalk going by talking, yelling and cussing. Roof top pool, very nice. Rooms need paint. Refrigerator slow to cool but then worked fine. Would not stay here again for the price of $200 a night with taxes.

Reviews.Title: “Love the Hotel Monte Carlo”
Reviews.Author: leeann94
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff is warm and helpful. Check in was quick and our room was very clean, as were the refrigerator and bathroom. We stayed at another OC hotel earlier in the summer and it was nothing but problem after problem. The roof top pool is fun for people with smaller kids because the depth of the pool is only 3ft. There is also plenty of seating. The housekeeping folks were courteous and didn't start cleaning/vacuuming at the crack of dawn. They always kept the elevator and tiled floors mopped and free of sand. We will definitely stay there again and would recommend it to anyone. There is also a Subway located in the hotel which was great for a quick/cheap lunch. The hotel is located only steps away from the Boardwalk and Dough Rollers, a great place to eat.

Reviews.Title: “Best Location, nice atmosphere, relaxing”
Reviews.Author: diavola999
Reviews.Content: Everyone at the front desk was pleasant and helpful. The room was nice and neat. It had a fridge, microwave, coffee & toaster. The roof top pool was great, and relaxing after a day at the beach which was only a half a block away from the heart of the boardwalk. We are planning our next trip again! Not really for the hotel, but I just wish we had more knowledge of the activities going on during our stay.There are lots of coupon books for restaurants and excursions. However, I heard about the bonfire and movies on the beach from others travelers. Better Information center needed!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: sacker20
Reviews.Content: I guess my expectations were greater than they should have been. Firstly, there is no parking at the hotel. You can park in a choice of a few lots which are located close to the hotel. This was a first for us. We've never had to park away from our hotel. Secondly, the lobby had strong onion odors, as it was located alongside of Subway Deli. Probably no fault of theirs, but what an awful smell to wake up to. The pool on the rooftop was not very clean. What could I say; simply that you can't judge a book by it's cover.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Monte Carlo turned our vacation around...”
Reviews.Author: PhillyRN2be
Reviews.Content: Our trip to Ocean City started off horribly. We arrived to be devastated by the condition of a hotel (name I will not disclose) in which we had a reservations. That hotel misrepresented its establishment on the internet. It was so disgusting, my husband and I forfeited our deposit and slept in our car the first night of our stay. During that night, we searched and found the Hotel Monte Carlo. It was a pleasant surprise. We checked in on the second day of our trip and were greeted by the most pleasant and personable hotel staff. The Monte Carlo turned what initially began as a horrible vacation into a vacation in which we did not want to end. The hotel was visually appealing as well. The lobby was clean and nicely decorated. Our room was great too. Unlike many of the hotels in OC, the Monte Carlo had King size bed suites. The room had a kitchenette as well which allowed us to keep juices and snacks in the room during our vacation. The bathroom was very nice, spacious and clean. Finally, location, location, location....that you could not beat. The Hotel Monte Carlo is situated in a prime location, its right in the middle of all the festivities and activities of the boardwalk and OC in general. You have the boardwalk, restaurants, scooter/bike rentals, shopping, and etc. all at your doorstep. This was our first time staying at the Hotel Monte Carlo and I can definitely say it will not be our last. My husband has already asked when I wanted to go back. We had a wonderful stay at the Hotel Monte Carlo and I can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “worth the money, and great service!”
Reviews.Author: meledoux
Reviews.Content: This hotel had great service! All the people were very welcoming and kind. I travelled with my boyfriend for our anniversary, and we're only 19. They let us stay and didn't even charge a security charge because we're under 21. I was very impressed. The location was perfect because, being one block off the boardwalk, the noise at night was much lower.

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms and good location.”
Reviews.Author: DonnaDC10
Reviews.Content: The rooms are large in size, have kitchen in room also. Hotel is keep clean. Indoor and outdoor are a plus. Hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. Located just feet from Ocean City boardwalk. Leave your car parked and walk for a day of fun.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but could use improvements”
Reviews.Author: jagalex67
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a great location for walking to the boardwalk and amusement park area. The indoor pool is basically useless. The outdoor pool is nice but only 3 foot deep. The room was spacious and fairly clean and smelled nice. The A/C system was great and kept the room nice and cool. The staff are very nice. Everybody at the front desk was very helpful, friendly and cheerful. Very nice people there. Parking was tight and cramped. I would recommend this hotel for budget minded travel. The pros better the cons.

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE...BE VERY AWARE...”
Reviews.Author: rip-off-patrol
Reviews.Content: This is in regards to several teenage boys that wanted to have a nice week vacation in Ocean City Maryland. I know we all try to let our kids handle things on their own to teach them responsibility. Don't do it with this hotel. A call was made in front of a me and my husband to cancel reservations within this hotels policy guidelines. The father actually dialed the telphone # to the hotel and handed the boy the cell phone to cancel. We know that 6/1 was the last day to cancel to stay within the policy guidelines. My son was ask for a reservation # which he did not have in front of him, so the person on the line pulled it up by the name on the reservation. It sounded like he was having no problems cancelling the resaervation and we thought it was a done deal. He said he was told they would get their deposit back. There was call made on that same evening by my son and he spoke with the same person. He said he and his friends were going to try and come for the week of July 17th(still trying to give the hotel their business) and hold the deposit instead on sending it back and then the boys having to return it if they were able to get together for July week. He said he would call back the end of the week which he did on 6/4 staing that the boys could not all get together for the week of July 17th. He was told he would get his money back, but less 25% and he agreed. He called on 6/7 to check staus on refund and was told that it did not go out yet, nothing about not be refunded. He called yet again on 6/14 to speak with Beth who told him that they would NOT be getting a refund because they did not cancel until 6/4. I was told how rude she was and when she was ask for a supervisor or mangaer my son was told she was the super or manager and the refund was not being sent. It is to my understanding that Beth is nor a supervisor or manager. I have phone records of 2 calls on 6/1, a call on 6/4, 6/7 and 6/14 from my sons cell phone. These were sent to the hotel and they have still decided to keep the boys approx. $700. I received the log and they have all the calls except the two on 6/1. My husband tried to make calls begin 6/15 but never got the general manager. He spoke to Beth and she told him to call the next day and speak with Roshani(hope spelling right). He did speak with her and she was going to look in to it and call him back. Not sure what she was looking in to but after waiting for some time he decided to call her back and was told no refund. Another angry father called and he was able to speak with Don the general manager and got VERY upset becasue the hotel stated they have no calll from 6/1 but only 6/4. The hotel was sent records of my sons cell phone and Don the GM stated that that meant nothing to them. Suggeated that what did we try and canel the reservations twince on 6/1, how stupid Don. The first call was to cancel and the second call was try try and come for July 17th and make your bosses more money then the $700 you kept. Where are these OWNERS, have they read any of the reviews on the mold, stench, crap on the toliets, taking money off of peoples charge cards after being home two weeks and not returning their monies either. They always seem to have an EXCUSE. PEOPLE read the reviews of this hotel. There are some good but the bad ones sounds like the hotel looks for every chance to get EXTRA MONEY. Read the reviw titled " Monte Carlo Suites are not so sweet', sounds like other teenagers had deposit issues. I would suggest that anyone having problems like we did call the Better Business Bureau, Greater Chamber of Commerce and go on line to the Attorney General of Maryland and completed a complain form as I am doing. I tired to find out who the owners are or have them contact me but I was shut domw on that. Hank said this could only be done through Don the GM(that will gwet me nowhere fast). Don you should be ashamed of yourself and I am sure you will have some lame EXCUSE as always. All the facts are in this review people. The lesson these boys learned, was even when you do the right thing, you can still get ripped off. SHAME ON YOU Hotel Monte Carlo!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: RStoney
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed in this hotel 3 times, mainly for the great location. We love being able to walk less than a minute to the boardwalk. The rooftop pool/hot-tub is nice and has a great view.

Reviews.Title: “Almost...But Not Quite”
Reviews.Author: EdLuva75
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel for 3 nights with my wife and 2 year-old daughter. Like the title of this review the hotel was almost nice, but not quite. PROS: Great location, less than a block from the boardwalk and close to the bus stops. Room and bathroom were clean Rooftop pool was nice and 3' depth was perfect for playing with a toddler. CONS: Only 1 elevator led to long waits. Constant wet floors in elevator and tiled areas outside the elevator. Subway restaurant on the 1st floor made the entire hotel (but not in my room) smell like nasty baking bread 24/7. The indoor pool was tiny and the pool room was very hot, making it unusable. The sliding glass door to the balcony was a mess, old and in need of replacement. This was probably the biggest con by far. It wouldn't slide easily at all, you had to use a lot of force and push back and forth a lot just to get it to move. My wife couldn't budge it most of the time. When you were fortunate enough to get the door slid closed, a lot of the time it wouldn't close all the way and the top was left open a crack. At night even that small 1/4" crack let in a lot of street noise. With the door closed the noise wasn't a problem at all. It sounded like most rooms had this problem because you could hear the noise of people struggling with the doors all around you. A real hassle. The room itself was ok, with 2 quuens beds, a couch, a small table with 2 chairs, and a small kitchenettte there was plenty of room for the 3 of us. The lobby was very small so it made it difficult to move around if there were people at the front desk. All-in-all, just an ok place. For the price I expected a little more.

Reviews.Title: “It's Ok”
Reviews.Author: LuvOCMD30
Reviews.Content: Went went to Ocean City, MD for a girls weekend. We are in our late 20's early 30's. We go to OC every year. The staff was very nice and pleasant. The view from the pool deck was great and the pool was very nice. The pool was very clean with plenty of chairs to use. The pool was never crowded. The convenience of being so close to everything on the boardwalk was great. The walk to the beach was easy. The carpeting in the guest rooms was new. Both beds in the rooms had 4 pillows on each. The downfalls to the hotel was first the parking. The hotel only has about 8 spaces underneath of the building itself. So if you are checking in on a busy day, like Friday, there is no were to leave your car while you unload. There were multiple other cars at the time of our check in already taking the small 3 car unloading spot along the curb. The parking lot is across the street from the hotel with minimal amount of spaces and the spots are super small. A full size SUV would have a very hard time parking in the space provided. Needless to say, we never moved our SUV thinking that we wouldn't have any spaces available once we returned. There is an additional parking lot available to guests but it is a block away from the hotel. The second downfall to the hotel is that the rooms smelled old and musty. It had an old cigarette smell. We sprayed the room with some air freshener and turned on the A/C. By the next day the smell had reduced. The bathrooms were somewhat clean and needed updating. The third problem was the shower is old. The worn out shower head would not stay in one place in the holder. One other thing to keep in mind is the hotel only has one elevator. So if you are going to be checking in on a busy Saturday I am sure the elevator would be a pain. If we were waiting to long for the elevator we would just take the stairs.

Reviews.Title: “Thank You Monte Carlo”
Reviews.Author: ksmpuddins
Reviews.Content: I just had to write a review, we just return from a week long stay at this hotel and it was awesome! The room was nice sized, clean and relaxing! We spent our 25th Anniversay there and we couldn't be more pleased! The STAFF was so wonderful and helpful, we hated to leave! They went out of their way to serve us. I can not understand why anyone had a problem with the staff (must have been the visitors attitude). I will be back to stay here and I will be bringing all my family. Great location to everything in O.C. I was very happy with our stay no issues at all! Oh and the Subway in the Lobby is amazing!! Thank You Monte Carlo The Miller's

Reviews.Title: “A perfect family hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: lovestar767
Reviews.Content: i stayed at the hotel monte carlo this air show weekend!! we have been staying at this hotel since past few years and we never had a problem!! we have seen a lot of renovations already and it seems to be getting better and better every time. They have a very friendly and welcoming staff ....i would def suggest this hotel to every one especially all the families with teenagers like mine. ..it is close to boardwalk, they have pools ( the beach water is still not warm enough), rooms that are clean and have comfortable beds, staffs with great customer service skills and price that you cannot beat..what else do u need for a memorable vacation!!

Reviews.Title: “BLATANT LIES”
Reviews.Author: tonytone85
Reviews.Content: I want to confirm that everything lindzloo has said it's 100% true 1) my card was never declined and to say that our card was declined without even knowing exactly what our full name and address is beyond me. I can provide credit card slips and bank statements that could prove in a court of law that my car was NEVER declined. 2)you did not even address a single issue that was mentioned in the review except that "uneducated guess that our staff is from india" cleary does not make a difference and not the issue 3)why would we be upset that "we had to pay to stay" isn't that the point of a hotel? 4)making blatant lies about your hotel is very unproffesional 5) there was stains check the other dozen reviews that confirm this...when we stayed there we did complain NUMEROUS TIMES and nothing was resolved just told us "we'll call you" i mean we didn't even have batteries in our remote and were told that quote "uhhhh i dont think we have any but we'll call you" unquote seriously?? i never thought this hotel would stoop this low jesus christ....

Reviews.Title: “Terrible service, and extremely overpriced for the quality of room.”
Reviews.Author: lindzyloo
Reviews.Content: I want to start by saying if this hotel was much cheaper I wouldn't have cared as much about all these things that I’m about to complain about. But for the prices we paid we expected none of the problems we ended up having. Also, I did not report a lot of these things to the hotel while we were there because everything we did complain about to them they did not do anything to take care of or fix. (With the exception of the blonde woman at the front desk who was very nice) My boyfriend and I just stayed at this hotel for my birthday. We wanted to stay somewhere nice but we don't have much money so we were only able to stay 2 nights in the middle of the week. Our room was $270 for 2 nights and from looking at the hotel's website it looked like a great place so we figured it was going to be worth the price. But we were wrong and it was a horrible experience. As soon as we got into the room there was trash on the floor, a bunch of candy wrappers. There was a sour smell coming from the fridge, and water was leaking out of it. There were black stains in the ice trays that looked like mold and when I tried to wash them the stains would not come out. There were stains on the couch, chairs, sheets, walls, and ceilings. Thankfully I always bring my own sheets and blankets to hotels so I didn’t have to worry about sleeping on the stained sheets. There also appeared to be mold (more black spots) on the walls in the bathroom, which also had a bad smell. The towel bar in the bathroom was also broken. Although this is a non smoking hotel there were cigarette burns on the chairs. Both beds in the room squeaked horribly even when you made the slightest movement and were very uncomfortable. There were no batteries in the remote for the TV. I called and asked for batteries but the man at the front desk told me he didn't think they had any but he would call me back and let me know. He never did. $135 a night and we can't even have batteries for the remote?
