There was a TV channel list in the room, but we did not receive a lot of the channels we were supposed to, and since we never got batteries for our remote we could not try to manually enter in channels to see if we could get them. An Indian girl checked us in and we gave her our credit card and everything seemed to be fine even though her English was almost completely un-understandable. After we went to the beach we came back and our room keys didn't work. When we asked why the woman at the front desk (a different woman with blonde hair) told us they de-activated our room keys because we had not paid! They had LOCKED us out of our room. When we told her we gave them the credit card when we checked in, she told us she'd find out what was going on. Apparently the woman who checked us in never charged our credit card! Although it took some time the blonde woman was helpful and understanding and we eventually got back into the room. The hot tub was also broken as soon as we got there and we asked about it and once again they said they did not know when it would be fixed, and that they would call us and let us know but they never did and it was never fixed. The air conditioner in the room stopped working in the middle of the night, but the next day it started working again. When we checked out at 11am we asked if we could leave our car in the parking lot for one hour so we could go to the beach. Keep in mind check in is not until 4pm so there would not be new guests for at least a couple more hours. The Indian woman told us “no not really”. You would think for the price we paid and all the problems we had they could at least let us leave our car in the lot for one measly hour after checking out but no. I will say that the location of the hotel is good, and the pool/deck area on the roof is great (except for the broken hot tub) and most of the time we had the pool to ourselves, but there were so many other problems it was hard to make the best of it. What really upset me was that this was my birthday trip and not only were we not able to afford a longer stay, but the time we did have there was full of stress that I did NOT want to have to deal with on my birthday. Regardless of the hotel we still had a good time in Ocean City. But we will definitely never stay here again unless they offered us a free room that would be clean with no problems.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome two thumbs up”
Reviews.Author: sandylouhd
Reviews.Content: Everything was great location. Room the staff was very friendly. Big thanks to Nate. The rooftop pool was awesome they also have an inside pool. We needed to do a little laundry that was great. Close to the ocean and the boardwalk. We give 5* and what a value. . Thank you so much. We will definitely be back and stay with you. Again. Jeff and sandy from Mo .

Reviews.Title: “Nice spot near the Ocean City Boardwalk”
Reviews.Author: KittyAB
Reviews.Content: Its not a 5 star hotel but you cant beat the location. Its only a 1 minute walk to the boardwalk. The staff was very friendly & helpful. The beds are very comfortable. Nice shower. Our room was huge with a balcony. Would stay here again on our next visit to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Overall good, BUT...”
Reviews.Author: Saharah99
Reviews.Content: Upon first arrival we were pleased. The rooms were not what we expected but we made due. We had a squeaky bed, but when we notified the GM he sent us a new bed and miniature golf passes...We thought isn't this nice...Unfortunately for us we bought our bikes with us and kept them in our room for the first 2 days on the third day we were told that we could not keep our bikes in the hotel and had to store them outside on the bike rack...BIG MISTAKE...Needless to say our bikes (practically brand new) were stolen. We locked the bikes up, but that wasn't good enough. While the hotel called the police so we could file a police report. We still haven't heard anything...I hope they recover our bikes...So I say all this to say DON'T stay at this hotel with your personal bikes. They may get stolen. On a brighter note the hotel is making updates. If we ever stay here again, I hope the updates are complete (specifically the bathrooms). The hotel has potential to be a really great place.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Monte Carlo is worth every cent!”
Reviews.Author: ECBulls
Reviews.Content: My Family and I had a great experience with the Hotel Monte Carlo. Our room was clean and comfortable and we loved how close we were to the beach and Board Walk. We even had a chance to use the indoor pool which is small but not too small to have loads of fun!

Reviews.Title: “Much better than average and very close to boardwalk”
Reviews.Author: carlag747
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff were all friendly, welcoming and helpful. The rates were great. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it - would stay again”
Reviews.Author: cdjohnson23430
Reviews.Content: My husband and I and my teenage daughter stayed in one of the new suites for a mini vacation. It was cozy and comfortable. It felt like home. Nice sized beds and bathroom. My only complaint was that were no doors for privacy to separate the sleeping areas from the kitchen. Everything was new and up-to-date ... the floors, counter tops, furniture, etc. Loved the balcony which was furnished with real patio furniture and not that plastic stuff. It was just a block over from the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “NASTY”
Reviews.Author: PACouple22
Reviews.Content: We booked a jaccuzi room with a King size bed. The room appeared to be clean when we checked in. The next morning we decided to straighten up the bed and to our disgust we found a dirty pair of red underwear between the layers of bedding. I called and complained, the man at the front desk said that he would have the bedding changed for us but did not apoligize. The bedding was changed but we found that they did not change the comforter, the underside of it appeared to be smeared with human waste! In the front lobby we also heard another guest complaining that the bathroom in his room was never cleaned and there was still waste in the toilet from the last guest!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff!”
Reviews.Author: kagriff17
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hotel Monte Carlo during the off-season in October. It was my first visit to Ocean City. I wanted a hotel that was close to the boardwalk, affordable and with an indoor pool. The Hotel Monte Carlo was exactly what I was looking for. I'd say the best part about my stay was the staff. They were terrific. They were very helpful to me and very kind to my daughter, who was sick our entire stay. In fact, at one point I went down to the lobby at 2am to find out if there was a doctor nearby and the person at the front desk gave me directions to the nearest hospital. During our stay they helped me find local restaurants and answered any questions I had about the area. I would definitely recommend the Hotel Monte Carlo to anyone else. The rooftop pool was very nice (albeit cold!) and the hot tub, also rooftop, was divine. My daughter and I enjoyed the indoor pool too. My only complaint about the room is that the toaster was broken and they didn't have a ready replacement. It certainly wasn't a dealbreaker for my stay, though. Our room was nice and big and the tv channels were great (we appreciated the Disney!).

Reviews.Title: “I would recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: traveler2596
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean, the staff was nice and the pool on the roof had a nice view.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: siminica
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel , beautiful pool on the roof , clean room . Good job 4 the management . BY ; Ionut Simionca

Reviews.Title: “Dirty Rooms and Rude Staff”
Reviews.Author: BeachG0er1
Reviews.Content: the Subway attached to the Lobby seems to be the hotels main priority, the keys have the Subway logo printed on both sides. The bathroom had mold under the sink in the bathroom there was hair in the shower from the previous guests. we decided to upgrade to a "suite" it was new which is why it was clean i am sure. We misplaced a key in the room and did not have time to search for it, they wanted to charge us $250.00 and the non English speaking Romanian behind the desk was unable to explain why. The manager was rude and cursed at us and would not allow us to go back to the room until he could escort us 2 hours later. the indoor pool was a joke, and the roof top jacuzzi was so small 3 people barely fit.

Reviews.Title: “To stay or not to stay”
Reviews.Author: JourneyGirl22
Reviews.Content: I'm not so sure why this hotel cares so much about tripadvisor.com. They give great emphasis on us leaving good reviews on this website. I will hand it to them that they have a very nice rooftop pool. The only downside of it is that it closes, I wish it could stay open twenty-four hours a day. They didn't have awful prices, but they did have awful customer service. I feel like these employees could be better trained in customer service. I have never worked in the customer service industry, but I don't think its too hard to please the customer. The woman who checked us in at the front desk was a tad bit snobby. I was expecting something more like a smile and a pleasant hello. I will not get my fifty dollar rebate for my stay, I wanted to be completely honest with my opinion. For you travelers, September is a fantastic time to stay in Ocean City. Its not too busy and places are still open.

Reviews.Title: “Superb view, downtown location and excellent value”
Reviews.Author: ajvandelay
Reviews.Content: The registration process was easy and quick. Hotel was located in downtown Ocean CIty as website noted. Check in process painless. Three hotel parking lots within one block (or less) from hotel. Roof top view (including the hotels pool) was magnificent. Our room as very large and immaculate. Less than one block to boardwalk, multiple eateries and beach. We had a great time and look forward to going back very soon. KKlinger.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, not good.”
Reviews.Author: John C
Reviews.Content: The pictures on there site do not look anything like the room we got. We got a king jacuzzi room. The hotel is a little noisy, but not too bad. The bed squeaks (We are newly weds..) but for $99 after a holiday weekend. not bad.. Also they don't want you to cook popcorn in the room (wife loves low fat popcorn..). Cant get on the roof after the pool is closed (would have been nice to go up near the pool and sit outside and smoke a cigar or drink a glass of wine) Rooms are a little run down. Could use some new lamps and carpet is a little ripped. Bathroom has a hole where something is missing. Other wise not bad.

Reviews.Title: “great choice”
Reviews.Author: beachymom09
Reviews.Content: Room was CLEAN. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The hotel is great location to the beach and boardwalk. Very nice Indoor and outdoor pool available, which was great for my little ones. Wish there was a bit more parking at the hotel. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed in August/Would like to go back soon!”
Reviews.Author: linda1744
Reviews.Content: Made last minute plans to go to OC. Stayed at the Hotel Monte Carlo on August 26th. Front desk service was great, room was fine, rooftop pool and hot tub were awesome at sunset. Very convenient walk to the beach. Great view from the rooftop of the city.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, We Loved Our Stay...”
Reviews.Author: DPC1207
Reviews.Content: We had to book a hotel at the last minute and were lucky enough to get a room at a very decent price. We were a bit skeptical because of some of the not so great reviews we had read. We found them all to be false. The Hotel is awesome! The room as well as the bathroom was exceptionally clean and had a beautiful fresh scent. The maid service was fantastic. When we would come back from our day of fun, the room always smelled fresh and was cleaned very well. The staff at the front desk were exceptionally nice and pleasant and always ready to help for any reason. When we asked for suggestions for dining, all their recommended places to eat were exceptional. The hotel also provided all their guests with a ton of discounts to area restaurants and attractions. The pool and hot tub were very clean and never overcrowded. We will definitely recommend the Hotel Monte Carlo to our family and friends and plan on visiting again in the very near future.

Reviews.Title: “Great family hotel with a great location!”
Reviews.Author: jcgirl19
Reviews.Content: This was our second family vacation to Ocean City that we stayed at the Monte Carlo. We were very pleased with the cleanliness of the hotel as well as the very helpful and courteous staff. This is a great location with everything at your fingertips. Some of our family members joined us at the hotel to stay for their first time, and they were very pleased also. We have three children, and we found it very comfortable to stay with them in a room, and they loved the roof top pool!!! We found it to be very safe. The hotel is right near the Dough Roller where we would have our morning breakfast which we look foward to. I would recommend this hotel to anyone, and would definitely return. We look forward to next year!! Keep up the great service!! ENJOY!!

Reviews.Title: “very clean and helpful hotel had a great time”
Reviews.Author: beachbum1952
Reviews.Content: the hotel was located in a nice spot steps from the boardwalk and beach. restaurants right beside hotel and shopping almost at our doorstep. would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Diamond in the rough, Very pleased.”
Reviews.Author: skylane815
Reviews.Content: I stay in OC 20 to 30 nights per year. Never at Monte Carlo before. I was very suprised by the clean neatness of the facility. I was shocked to learn of the roof top pool and patio area. Great views from the roof and wonderful staff willing to go the extra mile to help out. Now that I found this Diamond we will make them our first choice always when visiting OC.

Reviews.Title: “Vacation Getaway :)”
Reviews.Author: JM71708
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I came here for our anniversary and we were pleased with the hotel. It was just walking distance from the beach where we were at every day! Nice restaurants and entertainment are also walking distance from the hotel. Overall, it's in a great location which we liked. We also enjoyed swimming on the rooftop pool along with the great views. After we relaxed in the jacuzzi in our room which was very nice! We would definately recommend this hotel thanks to the courteous staff.

Reviews.Title: “Ocean City from a new viewpoint”
Reviews.Author: sampson29
Reviews.Content: We could not have been happier about choosing to stay at the Monte Carlo. WIth a 1 yr old we found the hotel to be ideally located for convenience of taking a quick walk to the beach or for a bite to eat on the boardwalk and back to the hotel pool again. Bye the way, the Dough Roller and Bull on the Beach are the closet and our favorites! The view from the roof top pool was amazing and in the all years traveling to OC, I had never experienced the view of getting to gaze at both the bay and the ocean. It was entertaining watching the fire trucks and ambulances from above as well. The pool is 3 ft the entire length and was clean and not very crowded. Even better is the roof top hot tub which we thouroughly enjoyed. We have no complaints about this place and feel the hotel staff were very nice and accomodating. We were able to check in early and they provided us with great breakfast spots each only walking distance from the hotel. This hotel was recommended to us by a family of five who stayed at the Monte Carlo in July 2009. After staying here we also plan to recommend the hotel to our other friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “NICE INTOWN HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: beachbum808
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel located directly off the boardwalk. close to all attractions. Room was very clean and beds were comfortable. Front desk staff very plesant. Parking was tricky. .

Reviews.Title: “Everything that you need in one place”
Reviews.Author: nmdavies0202
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Monte Carlo. Everything was just a few steps away. The food, entertainment, and many activities. We would definately recommend the hotel to all of our friends. The price was just right and the staff was extremely courteous and accomodating. Nicole Davies

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Monte Carlo was great!”
Reviews.Author: Weezie74
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at the hotel, we enjoyed our first stay in August 2008 so much we decided we wouldn't stay anywhere else when we went back this August. The location at 3rd st, just off the boardwalk was great for us- we parked our car when we arrived and didn't use it again until time to go home! We could walk to the end of the boardwalk to the amusements, great for our 9 year old, and back to the hotel without trouble since the 3rd street location was a perfect distance from the attractions. We tried out the various restaurants along the boardwalk for dinners/lunch and of course looked at all the t-shirt and souvenir shops along the way. The room was great too, just right for our family of 3, with a microwave, small sink and fridge, all handy to have. And though the Hotel seemed full, lots of people passing in and out of the lobby and on our floor, the room was totally quiet when we crashed for the night after the midnight return up the boardwalk - these are the quietest rooms I've ever stayed at, no noise from neighbors above or on the sides!! Their staff are friendly & courteous and the rooftop pool (including a jacuzzi) was great - we loved the view to look around the area!

Reviews.Title: “Our vacation at the Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: miraesh
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband enjoyed our stay at Hotel Monte Carlo. We relaxed in the Jacuzzi in our room after a hot and humid day on the beach. Most of all it is close to the ocean, resturants, and the rides.

Reviews.Title: “Amazinggg Trip!!! The perfect end to the summer!”
Reviews.Author: WorldTraveler0926
Reviews.Content: Hotel Monte Carlo is an amazing place to stay in Ocean City, MD. They have various amenities to please all guests. The staff is very kind and are always there to serve to all your various needs. This hotel is like a home away from home. I highly recommend it to all those who feel like having a ton of fun in a beautiful atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “We will continue to patronize this hotel year after year.”
Reviews.Author: nursefunky
Reviews.Content: My husband and I always return to Hotel Monte Carlo each year for our family vacation. This past weekend we had the opportunity to visit Ocean City, MD without our children so we chose a smaller room, one with a King size bed and a Jacuzzi. The bed was so comfortable, we did not want to get up in the morning. When we first arrived you would have thought we were looking at the cover of a Home and Garden magazine, the way the bed had been made up along with the scenic picture on the wall above it. The staff at the desk was friendly and knowledgeable. We also stay here every year because of how close it is to the beach and the boardwalk. One has the option of using the indoor pool or the roof top pool, both of which are always clean. Also, we especially enjoy the beautiful view of the ocean and the bay from the roof top. We will definitely continue to spend our OC, MD vacations at Hotel Monte Carlo.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Monte Carlo is a great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: emeremer
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great. The staff members were always pleasant and most helpful. They responded to our needs very quickly. The room was clean and ready upon our arrival. We made our reservations online and the room/amenities were just as stated on website. The view from our balcony was good (oceanside). Also, the hotel was very convenient to the ocean and board walk. My family and I had a great time and would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Welcoming”
Reviews.Author: Ticati13
Reviews.Content: From our last minute reservation, our arrival and stay to our check out.....everyone was most welcoming. Even though the hotel is not right on the boardwalk it was still a pleasure to stay there. It is an easy walk to the beach. After our sun and fun on the beach, there was a roof top pool and jacuzzi to enjoy. We were able to relax and view the beautiful sunset. We enjoyed being in the older part of OC and within walking distance of most activities. The rooms were very clean and the beds quite comfortable. We have already planned a return get away weekend in October.

Reviews.Title: “A great family place.”
Reviews.Author: AnnOilCityPA
Reviews.Content: Hotel Monte Carlo is located very close to the exciting end of the boardwalk. Our teenagers could come and go without worry. Subway is located on the first floor and a small convenience store just a block away made things easy. The staff is helpfull and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Steer clear”
Reviews.Author: mikoneg
Reviews.Content: I booked a three night vacation at this hotel from August 13Th to August 16Th ,2009. I reserved an efficiency suite with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed . We were going to celebrate my wife's birthday on the 13Th . I planned on taking her to Restaurant Antipasti for a great dinner and then back to our suite to open a bottle of wine and listen to music. On the 14Th our daughter , her husband ,and our 4 year old grand daughter were coming down from Philadelphia to spend a couple of days at the beach and boardwalk. Imagine my surprise when after paying for the efficiency suite we were given a foul smelling room with two small beds . Where were the queen beds and sofa bed that we reserved and paid for? The employee at the front desk at first denied that we reserved that particular suite. My wife who had brought her lap top stated to this employee that she would go on-line and pull a copy of the reservation . Well I imagine this gentleman then figured out that his scam was not going to work. He then told us in a condescending manner that he would give back the monetary difference in room rates or we could go some place else and he would give us our money back. When my wife asked to speak with a manager she was told he's off and may not be in the next day, keep in mind that this was 3:39 pm on a Thursday. Well we then left with a refund and found a clean motel about a mile away, on the beach ,called the Ocean Mecca . The room was spotless and the employee who worked at the front desk went out of her way to accommodate our needs.

Reviews.Title: “You have got to be kidding. Does anything work around here?”
Reviews.Author: lbg369
Reviews.Content: For a rate of $300 a night, it was a complete joke. For starters, there was no toilet paper in the room. The "ocean view" room was ridiculous. I almost broke my neck trying to see the ocean. The ice and soda machines were out of order, and the indoor pool was "temporarily" closed for maintenance. A hotel staff member initially represented that it would be for a "short while." When I insisted that she call the maintenance people for their estimate of how long the pool would be closed, they said 3 hours, which meant it would open 30 minutes before it was going to close for the night. The staff was unapologetic and insensitive. They represented that a manager would not be available for two days (after my check out date, conveniently). I will NEVER stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “very professional front staff”
Reviews.Author: tim2560
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 3 times now made a reservation in May for July and had to cancel last minute because of illness hotel was very flexible with letting us change our reservation to another night so we would not lose our money. very good location close to boardwalk and easy to get to beach . Also very clean will stay here a lot more in future..............

Reviews.Title: “awesome hotel. dont listen to any of them bad reviews”
Reviews.Author: alison d
Reviews.Content: on a friday my husband and our one year old daughter went to ocean city on a whim without booking any hotel. when we arrived down there we stopped at the hotel monte carlo and decided to stay there. the price wasnt bad and it was near the beach. when we got up to the hotel room the room was awesome. very nice very cozy. and very large. the hotel was very very clean.the staff was nice. we had to ask for a pack n play for our daughter and though we were charged for it(anymore we just bring it down with us) it was very clean and the staff was happy to lent us one.in fact it was such a nice hotel , clean pools that my husband and i are going down in a month and staying there again. dont listen to any of the bad reviews cause i think they are just making up lies. this hotel rocks and i will stay there for many many times to come. i even booked my mom there it was that nice. and i woundnt recommend a hotel that i didnt back up 100% percent

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Monte Carlo will take your money leaving you with horrible service and a bad stay.”
Reviews.Author: ler5128
Reviews.Content: As my friends and I got to the hotel, we parked in the parking lot closest to the hotel. Later we would have to park across the street and run across traffic if we wanted to safely make it to our hotel. Checking in was like checking in with a child who never had a math class. Counting our money was such a hassle for them. Just a tip, if you can't count, don't ask for the money in cash. Next we went up to our room with a pull out bed that you could couldn't even sit on, hard beds, and not enough towels. Room service hardly ever came and the workers there never knew how to solve any problems. The pools weren't even open when we were there and the free sub from subway they advertised was also a hassle to attain. Finally they gave us the money but it wasn't free because of tax, false advertising. There was hardly ever a manager on duty that I could speak with about all the problems. Upon leaving they could not give us our security deposit because a manager was not on duty. They told me to wait 4-5 weeks for it in the mail. I waited and waited and waited until I had to call. No one knew what the problem was, what a surprise, then they told me we never paid it. When we checked in they told us we did. This hotel needs to get it together. I would never stay there ever again and would never recommend it to anyone. No one should have to go through this hell.

Reviews.Title: “Great! for the Price”
Reviews.Author: GrandmaInTheCity
Reviews.Content: Our arrival was delayed due to a storm. I called the hotel to confirm our arrival and they assured us they were waiting for us. The desk staff was friendly and helpful. The maid service was fine and the rooms were clean and appeared newly updated. The beds were comfortable. All appliances appeared new and were in working order. Soap and shampoo were refurbished each day as was the coffee, all at no charge. The rooftop pool was clean and fairy large in size as was the sundeck. Vending machines were conveniently located. The lobby was small, the elevator was large. A Subway restaurant was attached to the hotel and you could smell the baking bread in the lobby, but not in our room. Location and price was the deciding factor in booking this hotel as it was only 1/2 block from the boardwalk, beach, and the DoughRoller Restaurant. On-site parking was limited, but parking was provided across the street at 2 different locations. Private balcony was nice but had a view of a parking lot--but the hotel doesn't advertise as having an ocean-front view.

Reviews.Title: “Checked on... checked out. Dirty, run down apartment feel.”
Reviews.Author: beckballs
Reviews.Content: My wife and I checked in at the hotel on Aug 5. First time we had ever been to Ocean City. We called ahead and got a room with king size bed. First, the parking is horrendous, cramped, and separated into 3 small lots, and two of them make you walk across a busy roadway. Everything about the hotel just gives you this cramped, dirty, run down apartment feel. Don't let the name "monte carlo" make you think of anything nice. When we first got into the elevator, we both got this sinking feeling in our stomachs. Did we just pay good money to stay in this place? The hallways are narrow and feels like prison. The rooms are worth about $49 in Ohio which is where we are from. We checked out the beach and decided we didn't want to stay at the hotel. I told the manager that we decided not to stay, annd he replied, Oh I'm sorry we don't offer any kind of refund. Less than an hour and we were out $171. Thanks Ocean City and thanks Monte Carlo. Never EVER again will I stay at this hotel or recommend it to anyone. Maybe a little refund wold have kept me from writing this negative review. I repeat this is a $49 per room hotelfolks, nothing more.

Reviews.Title: “A good stay at Hotel Monte Carlo”
Reviews.Author: tfunky
Reviews.Content: We stay at Hotel Monte Carlo every summer and going back in August. The room they gave us was top floor with the best view of the boardwalk and beach. The staff was helpfull, nice and made our stay great. The kids loved the roof top pool with the large deck over - looking the city. There were a few things they need to fix or upgrade. One was the ice machine (one for the whole building) and not having ice for the week because of it being used so much. Second, the room looked clean but we did find a pair of flip-flops under the bed. Third, the elevator is a little slow, but do have stairs. Other than those things we enjoyed our room, the hotel is located perfect in Ocean City . The hotel is just a block walk to the boardwalk and the price is in reason for the location. I would recommend Hotel Monte Carlo for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean, home away from home”
Reviews.Author: beachgirl21087
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Monte Carlo each summer since they opened and have found our stay consistently enjoyable. The rooms are nice, the ones we have been in each had a balcony. Hotel staff has always been friendly and personable. Hotel right off the boardwalk within walking distance of just about everything. Rooftop pool is awesome. Will look forward to staying there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: LeviNewCastle_PA
Reviews.Content: This was my family's first visit to Ocean City. I liked the location of the Monte Carlo. It was super close to the boardwalk and ocean. The location was nice because with having two young children we were close to everything (within walking distance). The room was clean and the staff was wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: shellsnax
Reviews.Content: the monte carlo hotel is a great place to stay with your family . the locate is so great ,right next to the boardwalk never a need to use your car .. no need to lug everything in your car and pay the parking meters, the staff was so helpful with my kids needs, the room was clean and cleaned up everyday of our stay . the roof top pool has a great view. I have been staying there for years and alway go back there

Reviews.Title: “Lots of fun, lovely stay”
Reviews.Author: GermantownFolks
Reviews.Content: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Monte Carlo. The staff was very pleasant - ask to speak with Chris. Great guy with professional service attitude. Pools are great, short walk to the boardwalk and beach. We had a CityView Unit which was clean and well kept. The kids had a great time in the outdoor, roof top patio as well as the heated indoor pool. No restaurant but a Subway on the main level.

Reviews.Title: “Monte Carlo Suites are not so sweet”
Reviews.Author: imaw13
Reviews.Content: As a senior graduating high school, my friends and I were eager to head to our senior beach week trip, which we booked with the monte carlo suites. Upon first arriving to the suite, which does have a nice setup with a kitchen and full fridge, we were impressed. However, this impression wore off after finding dirty towels hidden in the kitchen cabinets, a nasty earing and necklace on the floor and a dirty diaper still in the trash can. Being naive and excited, we failed to report these things, as we didn't find them immediately. The help at the front desk is not help. They could not tell us where public parking garages. We had to call down numerous times to have the pool unlocked, which was supposed to be already openend. Also the distance, while not far, was somewhat of a hassle if we needed assistance from the front desk. We knew that checking out might be a little troublesome, but never imagined the crap the hotel pulled on us. Being seniors, we had to give them a $500 security deposit for damage done to the room and the cleaning service. Upon check out we were supposed to get $480 back ($20 for room service). We even read the manual in the suite which noted that $10 would be taken out for dirty dishes. So, I cleaned all of the dishes. We also took out the majority of the trash. I thought about cleaning the room more, but trouble arose with my car and I could not worry about cleaning it. The room was in no way destroyed or damaged, just messy--there were six of us living it for six days. Eager to make money anyway they could, the hotel took $200 out of our deposit, because the room was "trashed." Yes, the floors the needed to be vacuumed, new sheets put on the beds, counters wiped off, and towels washed, but this in no way constitutes "trashed." The manager took my friends back to the room and yelled at them, saying they could take the whole deposit if need be. We offered to go back and clean it more, since we checked out really early, but of course they wouldn't let us, because they wanted our money. I can't speak for the main hotel, but I would not reccomend the suite location for any graduating seniors hoping to enjoy beachweek.

Reviews.Title: “don't go there!”
Reviews.Author: jjlovescountry
Reviews.Content: security is very lax, found room door unlocked and left open for easy enter by anyone. Busted towel bar in bathroom. Last night of stay, when turning down beds, found that bedspread was thrown over unmade bed with sheet and blanket at bottom of bed. Had night manager verify our complaint. We tipped everyday, and hotel did not even make an effort to make good by offering some sort of discount or apology. Have been staying at this hotel for 7 years - did NOT renew for Cruising weekend in May, 2010.

Reviews.Title: “AVOID THIS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: FatCatSushi
Reviews.Content: The rooms they put on the website have two type - Side Ocean View and the City View. I booked the Side Ocean View room which is about $50 more then the City view room. I went there to check the surroundings before my real trip because I want to make sure my girl and I stay in a nice view hotel. I am glad I did cauz their side ocean view rooms are terrible, not even close to side ocean view. It was blocked by buildings and nothing special. They charged me $50 for the terrible view and they can't refund if you cancel it within 14 days prior to my booked day. 14 DAYS! I really don't think that's reasonable . Finally I was so mad and let them took my deposit and went to another hotel with only $60 more than Monte and come out with two private balconies, two LCD TV, top floor, nice clean room. I was glad I made that decision and we had so much fun.

Reviews.Title: “My stay at Monte Carlo”
Reviews.Author: prince2627
Reviews.Content: Hi i just wanted to say that i really liked your hotel and i enjoyed my stay and would love to come again. Its Very clean and lots of activties to do . Thank you and definetly looking forward to it again.

Reviews.Title: “nightmare”
Reviews.Author: jagger36
Reviews.Content: They took extra money off my credit card two weeks after we got home, won't give it back. So whatever you do, don't give your credit card number. Bathrooms were really dirty.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Hotel- Great!!!”
Reviews.Author: beachgrle1
Reviews.Content: My favorite parts of the hotel i enjoyed were the indoor pool, outdoor rooftop pool and jacuzzi on the rooftop, Our room had a hot tub inside our room, this hotel is very nice located a block from the boardwalk and beach but the only downfall is that this hotel is a tad pricey but i loved it and enjoyed it

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms but very poor service”
Reviews.Author: buzzlog
Reviews.Content: We stayed at their newly opened suites on 11th street since they could accomodate us (5 adults and one child). The good thing about the suite location is that you get one free parking under the hotel. Also, it's all brand new and only a block away from the boardwalk. The bad thing about this property is that they don't have any personal on that property to help you with any of the servcies. We stayed three nights but we did not get anyone to come clean the rooms, open the swimming pool and provide us with towels and toilet paper for the first two days. We called their main property on 3rd street numerous times to request for towles, cofee, etc. and they said that someone will be there shortly. Needless to say, that no one showed up for the frist two days. We luckly ran into the assistant manager for the hotel on our third day and told her about the many problems we were dealing with and she finally on our last day had someone give us towels and toilet paper. The swimming pool was hardly open even during day time since no personal came from the main office to open it. The internet stopped working after the first day and they don't have phones in the room (at least none that work). I would understand the issue if this was 1 or 2 star hotel but they are priced like a 3 or 4 star hotel. I would not stay at The Monte Carlo again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, great location!”
Reviews.Author: SuzDE
Reviews.Content: We have returned every year, for the past 4 yrs now....With two young boys, this hotel is convenient, close to attractions, and very affordable as well. The staff has always been quite helpful and courteous. Looking forward to returning this July!

Reviews.Title: “Needs Improvement”
Reviews.Author: pubboots
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel during the weekend of the air show..Granted we decided to go the week before and this hotel seemed to be the only one we could find that was close and had a rather good price... Upon arriving the lobby smelled like commercial ovens due to a Subway being connected to the lobby and elevator...There is only one elevator which is very slow...We got a room on the 4th floor..ocean view side with two queen beds..one of the beds did not even have a sheet on it!!!!...The hallway had a musty smell. We had to ask for clean towels since the maid service never came into our room the next day. Towel rack in the bathroom came off the wall, toilet ran and shower head had a sqeaking noise....

Reviews.Title: “2 night stay”
Reviews.Author: hm06129
Reviews.Content: Thought the hotel was great, customer service at the front desk was great both nights. Really friendly and willing to help. Only problem that we had was parking which was in two locations. There were 5 spots right near the entrance of hotel which was covered but the other parking lot was on the other side of the street and really cramp. Also the room was clean only problem we had there was that the bathroom door would not close completely. other wise everything was great would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable Price, Friendly Staff, Convenient Location”
Reviews.Author: BeachBabe917
Reviews.Content: My brothers and our significant others stayed at the new Monte Carlo Suites located on 11th street for the Import Weekend car show, June 6th thru the 9th. The hotel staff was very friendly and when we had any problems, they would do whatever they could to help us. Carlo, the assistant manager who was staying on our floor, came by to check on us to see if there was anything he could get for us. The rooms were very clean and spacious. With 7 people in the room, it didn't feel like we were on top of each other. The balcony was big and very relaxing. You could actually see the ocean from the balcony. The boys liked the balcony the best because they could watch the cars go up Baltimore Avenue. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again. We're thinking about booking again in July for my brother's birthday weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Complete Satisfaction”
Reviews.Author: dragonfly1289
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here year after year for the fireman's convention and we keep coming back. The prices and the accommodations are just prefect! It's a great location, easy access to the beach, shops and food. The rooms are roomy, clean and do not have a smell of some of the hotels in the area. Keep up the great work and thanks for not raising the prices like some of the other hotels/motels. Its another reason why we keep coming back.

Reviews.Title: “one of my faves”
Reviews.Author: deedeeninja
Reviews.Content: my favorite hotel in ocean city is the monte carlo. service was very good,the staff were very friendly and helpfull especially for being our first time in ocean city.the sites they suggested to visit was very good.the rooms were very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing”
Reviews.Author: MADDOG3712
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd year staying at the Hotel Monte Carlo, this is a great place to stay especially if you have little ones, Moms, NO worries about the ocean they have a roof top pool (very clean) which is awesome for the little ones , You can relax and enjoy the sun while they enjoy 10 hours in the pool. Everyone at the hotel was polite and generous on making our stay a want to return hotel. Plus they have SUBWAY in the hotel which the kids loved.

Reviews.Title: “Great Trip”
Reviews.Author: LMJEnola
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a great location. Just minutes away from the board walk. The hotel staff were friendly and courteous. They were helpful in giving ideas on where to eat and what was open. The room had a coffee maker, microwave, and refrigerator which was nice. The hotel was was clean and comfortable with a homey feeling.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel + a Great Bargain”
Reviews.Author: Sassygirl18
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Monte Carlo in late April, 2009 off-season and were really pleased with the hotel. For a reasonable price, we had low expectations, but we were pleasantly surprised. The hotel was clean and modern, and our room was sparkling new - it must have recently been remodeled. We had one of the rooms on the side of the building with a view of the bay. Our room had 2 double beds which were pretty comfortable, and plenty of pillows. The room also had an efficiency "kitchen" area which had a sink, 2 kitchen cabinets, a microwave, small refrigerator, toaster and a small coffee machine. Coffee was included (no dishes, or utencils, so you will want to bring them). The room also had an iron and ironing board and of course a bathroom. Everything was in ship-shape and very nice. (See photos attached). The front desk staff was very friendly and the housekeeping staff was did a great job and also was very friendly. The hotel has a rooftop pool which is just beautiful (it had just been filled when we visited, so the water was too cold to swim in) as well as a small indoor heated pool in a heated room. The hotel also has an exercise room which we did not visit. We weere also told by the front desk staff that they have Wi-Fi, which we did not use. We liked the fact that the hotel was in a great location. It's not directly facing the beach...it's behind a hotel that faces the beach, so you are just steps from the boardwalk right in the center of the action (the hotel is on Baltimore Avenue at 3rd). All in all a great place to stay and we will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “excellant hotel and very friendly personnel and close to shopping and eating and cocktails”
Reviews.Author: dknywest
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the hotel monte carlo was wonderful. The personnel was very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and very roomy. We especially liked the balcony to sit on at night and listen to the music in the next hotel across from us. I would recommend this hotel to our friends and we will be renting again this summer as well as in the past years . Thank you guys you are the greatest. Karen Kuhn

Reviews.Title: “I do recommend this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Jaxson2007
Reviews.Content: The stay was nice. Activities close to hotel. Quick walk to the boardwalk. Enjoyed the indoor and outdoor pool.

Reviews.Title: “Rude staff,terrible maid service,rate was not what was quoted.”
Reviews.Author: mikesroadhouse
Reviews.Content: Made reservations for March 13th & 14th,4 rooms.Had to cancel one room and was told I would have to pay the reservation fee (one nights stay) and I agreed. Checked in and was charged a higher rate than was quoted over the phone,ok we can live with that were here. A friend called me and wanted to come down for the weekend with his wife and I said great I had to cancel one of my rooms and that they could have it,just tell them at the desk when they arrive. The following day all 8 of us went out around 11:00 am and returned around 11:00 pm. The beds weren't made,no trash removal,no coffee for the morning,no clean towels and our heat had been turned off,it was cold. Called the front desk and was told they would address the problem in the morning. Next morning didn't hear a thing. We decided to stay another night but booked a room at another hotel. We were checking out and were told we owed an additional $148.00. We asked what for and could not get a reasonable explanation or an itemized bill explaining the extra charges. We asked to see the manager but he would not come down to the lobby he would only talk over the phone. My friend talked with Mr. Bowden the manager and could not get any straight answers from him. Mr. Bowden was rude and hung up the phone. We did pay the additional money only because they had my credit card number. The couple that had taken the cancelled room were told when they were checking out that they would have to pay an additional fine of $200.00 for smoking in their room. They were held up a half hour while the room was checked out by the smoking police I guess. Anyway they didn't have to pay the $200.00. I filed a complaint with the Better Business Bureau with no results. Emailed the OC chamber of commerce,no response from them at all,so now I'm here venting. I have been to many hotels/motels and have never had any problems. If I were you I would stay far away from the MONTE CARLO HOTEL.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”
Reviews.Author: sasserbugs
Reviews.Content: This was the first time in this hotel and it will definitely not be the last. The service and the room was great.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with a pleasent staff. best location on the boardwalk”
Reviews.Author: fordman02
Reviews.Content: this hotel is in the best location on the board walk you can walk just about anyware that you like. the hotel is clean and the staff is very pleasent and helpful. and the rates are just as good.

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel Monte Carlo was so convenient. The location was great.”
Reviews.Author: VICBELLET
Reviews.Content: The Hotel Monte Carlo was so convenient. The location was great. We stayed at there while attending the Sand Duels Soccer Tournament. It was my second trip to Ocean City in 15 years. I was totally unfamiliar with the area. The staff was great in giving us guidance and recommendations. The hotel was nice, we had a great view and were very comfortable during our stay. I'll definitely go back this year.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay ,super local, going back again this year.”
Reviews.Author: smokeum
Reviews.Content: It was our first trip to Ocean City last year for the car cruise weekend. The Monte Carlo Hotel is in a prime location for all of the fiestivies of the weekend. Great room with an excellent view. Planning our return trip again this year. I'm sure our accomadations will exceed our expectations again.

Reviews.Title: “All These Bad Reviews? Its Not Really That Bad”
Reviews.Author: xxmikeinchainsxx
Reviews.Content: I Was So Afraid To Stay At This Hotel Because Of All The Bad Reviews. Let Me Tell You, Its Not Bad. And For The Money, Its Actually Really Good. This Was My First Trip With My Girlfriend And Away From My Parents. We Usually Stayed At Really Nice Places With Them, Like The Hilton And Such, But Those Places Still Have Their Problems. I Get To The Hotel About 12, Check In Time Is At 3. I Park Next Door And Enter And The Lady KINDLY Says I Can Go To My Room. Then I Ask Her If I Can Park Next Door. She Says I Can Not, But I Can Park In Any Of The Parking Spots Under The Hotel, Or Across The Street. The Parking Lot Fills Up Fast (Only Like 10 Spots) But The Lot Across The Street Wasn't Bad, A Little Tight Though. I Unpack My Stuff And Park The Car Across The Street. I Get To The Room And It Looks Fine. I Don't See An Ash Tray So I Go Downstairs To Confirm That The Room Is A Smoking Room And The Lady KINDLY Says It Is On The Patio And Gives Me An Ashtray. We Decided To Get Some Dough Rollers (Because Its Right Under You) And We Had Left Overs, So It Was Nice Just Having To Go Upstairs To Put It In The Fridge. When We Get Back To The Hotel At Night, I Wanted Some Ice. I See That You have To Get It From The Front Desk. I Go Downstairs And Ask The Lady For Some Ice, She Turns Around And Gets It From The Cooler. She Didn't Say You're Welcome Or Anything, But Who Cares? I Go Upstairs And Watch TV (And The Remote Does Work), The Music From A Few Streets Down Was Drifting In, So I Decided To Sit Out On The Balcony And Listen To It For A While The Worst Things About This Place Are: Parking Is A Little Bad, But You're So Close To Everything, You Don't Have To Drive One Guy In The Elevator Said He Could Not Bring His Bicycle Inside Because His Bike Was Too Dirty, But He Said He Found A Pubic Hair On His Bed. That Made Me A Little Sick, But He Sounded Like A Drama Queen. Its Not 5 Stars, But I Paid Over Half Less Than What They Charge I'm Going Back Again In July And I'm Gonna Have A Blast Again

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: luv2travl08
Reviews.Content: If I could say anything about this hotel it is STAY AWAY. The staff at this hotel are soooo rude. The hotel it self needs a serious cleaning. Too the point the first night we stayed the sheets on our bed had blood stains on it. Housekeeping should never put sheets on a bed that has blood stains(throw them out). Ok the hotel swears it is smoke free but you can see all throughout the hotel that it's not. Our comforter had cigarette holes in it, even the drapes had cigarette holes in it. The hotel had a musty smell, housekkeping really needs to do better. The pools were dirty. The hot tub was so dirty that the grot which is in between the tiles should be white it was black. I was so upset that we prepaid with expedia to stay at this hotel and it wasn't cheap. The pictures and the description really fool you. I wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone. Holiday Inn as well As Comfort inn have beautiful hotels right on the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “Our awful stay”
Reviews.Author: Hollie135
Reviews.Content: For the last 4 yrs we have stay at this hotel, and i must say this yr was ythe worse, we stay for a car twice a yr. for 4 days, on this stay it started right from the beginning, at check in , front desk was rude, one person i might add, she doesnt care anything about the ppl that stay let alone about the hotel, go up to our room , unpack and leave to reg car, get back at midnight to find our bed, has clomps of someone elses hair, and the sheets had not been changed from the last visitors, how nice huh. call front desk , night time person personally came and helped me change our bed, and was so sorry for what we had found, then, remotes to TV dont work , let alone match the TV set , doesnt take a high school grad to figure out the the tv and remote have to be the same, second one they give me, doesnt work, at this point i gave up. Coffee pots in rm, and we need to purchase coffee after the first night, fine, but when you go and ask for it, nothing but additde, in which you forget the coffeebecause of the anger that has built up inside, nasty staff, smart mouths , and bad part is manager stands right off to side and allows it, Ppl should be treated with respect and this hotel has none, and i want the world to know, im trying to find main headquarters number, if anyone can help plz do so, Park place right next door, was very understanding when we put in for our syat next spring, VERY UNDERSTANDING

Reviews.Title: “Very discourteous staff at the Monte Carlo”
Reviews.Author: BeachLover1965
Reviews.Content: We came to the hotel around 11:30 a.m. and we asked if we could check in, she said no not until 3:00p.m. Of course it was off-season and their were not many occupants in the rooms. We were allowed to check in at 2:00p.m. and we did. The manager asked how many people and we said 2 adults 2 children. She said she is going to charge us extra for our children. We said when we booked the hotel the woman at the desk at the time quoted us a different rate. My children are both under 18, so why would they be charged them as adults. We payed only the rate that was quoted and checked into our rooms. The rooms were o.k. a little small. I thought we would get ocean view, we had no view. Upon checkout the manager informed us we owed another $44.00 for our children. We said we were not going to pay it and if I had known that the room was that much, I could of gone somewhere else. Well guess what, she ran our card through after we left. I am very displeased and I feel the manager was very dishonest.

Reviews.Title: “Average Accomodations”
Reviews.Author: rspeaker67
Reviews.Content: After walking out of the Commander Hotel (see my other reviews) we landed at the Hotel Monte Carlo. It was definitely an improvement, although nothing spectacular. We spent 3 nights here in the Summer of 2007 (8/12/07 - 8/14/07). The room was nice and spacious although the bed was probably the worst hotel bed I've ever slept (well, tried to sleep) on. The location wasn't too bad, it's on Baltimore Ave on the Ocean side, between 2nd and 3rd, so it's only half a block to the boardwalk and beach and a short walk to the Inlet/Pier area. There's a Subway attached to the lobby and a Dough Roller just up the ramp. The lobby is very small, there is 1 elevator and a flight of stairs. The hotel isn't very big, probably less than 100 rooms on 4 floors. The rooftop sundeck was very nice as was the jacuzzi. The pool, however, was VERY cold and only 3' deep. The indoor pool, accessed from a separate outside door or inside hallway, was warm but even smaller than the rooftop pool. Staff were all very friendly. Room keys are very easily demagnetized by cell phones or other credit cards, we had to have our room key reactivated several times over the 3 days. We asked for a quiet room, and got one at the far end of the hallway. The only complaint we had upon checking out was that the hallway music that played all night could be heard in our room. Otherwise, it wasn't too bad.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in oc”
Reviews.Author: Lovestotravel1953
Reviews.Content: My parents first stayed at the Monte Carlo and they loved it, so the next I made reservations that's where I made them. And they were right it is a very nice place to stay. It’s very clean and the staff is most helpful and pleasant and always greets you in the lobby. Since my first stay there we’ve been back several times. I have stayed at a lot of places down Ocean City and I can honestly say this is the nicest place to stay. Actually have reservations for September. I also like the fact that they have a outdoor pool as well as an indoor pool and only a block from the ocean and broadwalk. I would stay there again and again...

Reviews.Title: “Our first trip to OC MD”
Reviews.Author: McGJJJ
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to OC, MD so I can't compare the Monte Carlo to other hotels in the area. I can say that all of the employees were very polite and helpful, and the room was clean and comfortable. All appliances and the air conditioner in the room worked well. The rooftop pool area had a great view, and the shallow pool (about 3 ft) was good for my younger kids... no deep end to worry about. The location was close to the "busy" end of the boardwalk with all of the arcades, another plus for the kids. We could see the ocean to the side from our balcony. The downsides were: very tight parking for an SUV, we walked from the lot across the street. The indoor pool room was extremely hot (I guess this may be OK if you're swimming, but it was hard to breathe just watching the kids from the bench so we didn't stay long) and the cardio-room/gym was also so hot it was not really usable. We had to wrestle quite a bit with the "key card" to get into our room until we got the hang of how the locks worked. I think this motel was good for the price and we would consider staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “They Screwed Me Over Before I Even Got To Stay!”
Reviews.Author: vik85
Reviews.Content: I called the first time to place a reservation for September of 2008. The young lady who answered told me I had to call back because the fire department was there and they had to evacuate (sign#1 that I should not have booked a reservation there). I called a couple of days later, made my reservation and was told how much the deposit would be, gave my credit card info and the amount that was charged to my account was higher than what I was quoted would be taken out (sign#2 that I should have not booked a reservation there). so I called to find out what happened and the night manager, very rudely explained to me that the young lady who told me how much the deposit would be was incorrect in the amount she quoted me(sign#3...) I informed the manager that I would like to cancel my reservation and she told me if i wanted to cancel my reservation I would still be charged the $15 cancellation fee plus tax!! Even though it was not my fault!! Now I have to wait 3-4 weeks for my money to be refunded back to my account. That money could be used to book another reservation... somewhere where the customer is more appreciated. I didn't get the chance to stay at the Monte Carlo and I'm glad I didn't, I can only imagine what it would've been like. Poor Poor Poor.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and close to the boardwalk, well worth it.”
Reviews.Author: MdVacation
Reviews.Content: Just found out about this site, so sorry for this very delayed review. Very nice hotel with a nice website as well. The staff checked me in quickly and greeted me. Stayed in a jacuzzi king bed room. Very clean, spacious, and comfortable. The parking lots are not that far from the hotel at all, of course some people rather would not want to cross the street but the speed limit is like 25 mph in this location as well as plenty of lights and crosswalks. Never made it to the pool area, since I had a jacuzzi. In the middle of August nothing beats walking out and onto the boardwalk in under 5 minutes, you cant beat that! I had no problems what so ever. Check out was fast as well.

Reviews.Title: “a little pricey.. but a nice place”
Reviews.Author: stellar69405
Reviews.Content: went 2 years ago for a stay with my boyfriend. decided to splurge for a jacuzzi room. the monte carlo seemed like the best price. check in was fine -- downside was the small parking area aT the hotel itself. very small, but they had another lot about 2 blocks down. we were lucky to find a spot at the hotel itself the first day... only moved the car once to go to dinner a few nights in and had to park in the other lot when we returned. yes.. the lobby does have a special aroma.. haha... the subway is convienient, but they COULD do something about the smell.. the last thing you think you'll be smelling when you go to the beach is fresh baked bread... then again... it could REALLY be worse. :-) went to the room and saw the jacuzzi... its NOTHING like the pictures on the hotels website. room was clean and big. bathroom was a little cramped but thats to be expected. bed was comfortable enough (i'm a picky sleeper). the view wasn't great, but we wern't expecting a oceanfront room anyway (at the time i dont think they had a ocean view room.. now i believe they do??) the worst part?? after we left i realized i left my FAVORITE sweatshirt in one of the drawers (i'm not the type to put things in drawers, but for some reason i did).. called about a hour after we left and told them the room number and told them that i had left a sweatshirt and that i would pay to have it sent back to me in PA. they took down my address and said they would have someone call after the room was cleaned. never heard from them, so i called the next day. was told i'd get a return call.. never heard from them. called a 3rd time and was told that they COULD NOT send it back to me and that i would have to come to pick it up. ended up taking a day trip down a week later, so i decided to stop by and pick it up..... yet NO ONE seemed to know what i was talking about, however the employees were the same ones that were there when i stayed!!! All in all.... it was a good place. a little pricey, but when it comes down to it.. if you're worried about what you might be sleeping in, this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service.,,,,”
Reviews.Author: m0mmy2323
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Monte Carlo during mothers day weekend with our 5 year old daughter, , we Loved our room , it was spacious, all of the staff we came accross was very nice and helpful. The hotel was clean, There is parking at the hotel and across the street but you could drop off your things at the underway and move across the street instead of walking across the street with everything. We enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “loved it!”
Reviews.Author: Brit06
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in many hotels in OC and this by far is my favorite. it was CLEAN, the staff was super nice, our Jacuzzi was amazing, and the room was a decent size. Probably the only negative thing about it was that their parking lot is pretty small, and across the street. If its full(which it usually was) they have another one like a block or two away, but that wasnt really an issue, since you could pull the car up to the hotel and unpack your things. It was very nice that the beach, and boardwalk were only a block away, and you dont have to cross any busy streets to get there. I definitly plan on revisiting this hotel again next year!

Reviews.Title: “Never again!!!”
Reviews.Author: Hottips67
Reviews.Content: We went & never even stayed for 1 night. We immediatley got to the room saw how dirty it was & got on the phone to stay at another hotel. The entry smells all the time because it is attached to a Subway sandwich shop. The pool indoors is more like a hot tub. This place should charge minimum price as it is as low class of a hotel as you can get.

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I have ever been to by far!”
Reviews.Author: jdcurtiss4343
Reviews.Content: I strongly urge everyone going to Ocean City to avoid the Hotel Monte Carlo like the plague! Me and some friends stayed at the hotel a couple weeks ago and have never been treated worse. The customer service is terrible. The people who work their are rude and extremely unhelpful. The way they treat their customers is shocking. In fact, one night when we were staying there a friend came up to our room to get something that a friend in the room needed to give him and moments later we got a knock on the door saying we were being evicted (it was 3:30 a.m). Then while trying to figure out what we were going to do about being on the streets in the middle of the night two men approached us and pulled knives on us. After we reported the incident to the police the hotel manager had the nerve to call us in our room and threaten to evict us for lying to the police. After the threatening of a lawsuit the hotel had a change of heart and allowed us to stay in the hotel. A real nice move seeing that we paid over 1500 dollars for the week.

Reviews.Title: “Very kid-friendly hotel!”
Reviews.Author: justsmurfy
Reviews.Content: I booked a trip with a local bus company but I didn't like the hotels they were staying at so after much research online, I chose the Hotel Monte Carlo. Even though there were some bad reviews, compared to what I had to choose from, I was willing to take the chance and I'm glad I did. I traveled with my 2 children, ages 6 and 9. We arrived at 12:30 and our room was not ready, but I expected that. They allowed me to leave my luggage, however, there was some hesitation by the staff member, but I told him I called ahead about that because I knew I was going to arrive early and he agreed to allow us to let our luggage there. We came back at 2:30 and our room was ready. The entire stay was wonderful. Everything the website said would be in the room was there...toaster, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, iron, ironing board, hair dryer, etc. The room was clean and very quiet, which were 2 things I was concerned about when traveling with my children. The staff we dealt with were very, very nice. The day we checked out we were not going to meet our bus until 2:45 and the lady at the desk was very happy to let us leave our luggage there until we were meeting our bus. The roof-top pool was wonderful, especially for children. It is only 3 feet deep so I could lounge poolside comfortably without worrying about them. We did not use the indoor pool, as that was pretty small and had too many people in it already. Besides, it was between 4 and 5 feet deep which is too deep for my kids. The hotel is also very close to the beach, much closer than I expected. This was a great plus for us. I'm very glad I chose to stay at the Hotel Monte Carlo. It was my kids first trip to Ocean City. They had a great time and loved the hotel. The price was great compared to surrounding hotels. You can't beat the price for what you get and how close you are to everything. We are hoping to return every summer! See you next June!

Reviews.Title: “Great, Wonderful ,Awesome what more can I say.”
Reviews.Author: crazyantdee
Reviews.Content: This hotel was GREAT! Me my daughter and a friend went down for cruising weekend knowing the hectic and loud time it would be. The staff was Great.I have never stayed at a hotel where I got such great service and A good morning or afternoon. The staff was friendly and very helpful. We checked in early and told At 11:00 am our room would be ready and it was. As busy as this weekend is we got parking on the lot at the hotel and was told you could unload at door. We only once at the last night at our stay had to park 2 blocks down at the other lot and it is a bit small for bigger cars and suvs. It wasgreat Deb and Willy was great. Ity was nice to stay at a place where you can joke around and have a nice time with the staff. They were always helping people and always busy when we saw them, Which was alot since we are always coming and going. With the hotel only one block from board walk{if that}. You have everthing right there for you to do why leave.you have resturants allround carniaval at end of boardwalk. The indoor pools small but very nice the roof top pool is very big and the hottub is great. We used them all and it was wonderful. If anything do not miss out the view from the rooftop. At night it was just beauitful. I will be staying here again thanks to the staff Deb and Silly Willy .{hope willy is doing great at his police job. Will miss you Willy.

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: mck88
Reviews.Content: im only writing this cause i see a few negatives and i dont feel this hotel deserves it. i have stayed here 2 times. once last summer and once a few years before that. Both times i stayed i was there for a week. this is a great place. most places in oc, md arnt that nice, but this one is. all around. its a little pricey compared to most of the hotels in the south oc, md area, but it is worth every penny. clean rooms, good hotel service, and it does have a very safe feel.

Reviews.Title: “When reading reviews on this hotel, please believe it”
Reviews.Author: kishamichelle
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here in March of 2007, and I read the comments before I went. I even called the hotel and spoke to the front desk. He said those comments were not true. When we got there at 4:00, the subway next door had already closed. They make the rooms look great on-line. We got the room with the Jacuzzi, that was fine. The beds are old, and the rooms aren't that big. Please, and if you are going for the indoor pool, you minds well stay in your room and take a bath. That is about the size of the indoor pool. I think maybe 4 people could fit in a time.

Reviews.Title: “Nice room for the $$”
Reviews.Author: Luv2GoPlaces08
Reviews.Content: Room was very clean, and rates very reasonable. Had a nice corner balcony view of the ocean. Good selection of TV channels. The staff were very friendly. Parking is pretty limited. Only went down for one night, but had a nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Baltimore2
Reviews.Content: The hotel room was very big and clean. We only stayed for 2 nights and did not need maid service so we kept the do not disturb sign up. The maid service left us a bag of extra towels in front of the door in case we needed them. All rooms were efficiency with ironing boards and irons and refrigerator and hair dryers. We arrived at 12:00 and they let us go to our room early and did not charge us. The hotel staff was very friendly. The parking is an issue the spaces are very small if you own a SUV or truck. They do have two lots but both lots were not for people with big vehicles. The hotel manager let us park on the lot next door to their parking lot since that motel was closed for the season. Great location we could go to all the bars around and did not have to move our vehicle. Would definitely stay there again in the off season when there is more parking spaces.

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleased with Hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: prices28
Reviews.Content: My husband and I booked the Monte Carlo for a weekend away without our two small children. We had never been to Ocean City,MD and I was nervous after reading some reviews of the Monte Carlo. We arrived early and even though the room was not ready they called our cell phone to let us know when it was. The staff was very friendly. The room was a nice size and we had a nice balcony with a side view of the ocean. The location was perfect. My husband fished on the pier while I did some shopping. We also went to two of the bars and were able to walk. We never had to move our car. We will definitley be returning next year with our children and staying at the Monte Carlo!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: towner609
Reviews.Content: My husband, my children and I stayed at the Hotel Monte Carlo the week of June 17, 2007 After reading all of the "bad reviews" the hotel received, I was a bit scared that the hotel would not be nice. The "bad reviews" were wrong. The hotel was clean, the staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room was a nice size and clean. We had a wonderful view! The maid cleaned the room every time we put the maid sign out. The location of the hotel was very close to the boardwalk - there were no streets to cross to get to the boardwalk and the view from the rooftop pool was amazing! We would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Please do not waste your time energy or money it's not worth it.”
Reviews.Author: mica679
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed at the hotel during Memorial Day weekend. Parking is terrible, there are only 8 spots on the premises. If you are not there early enough, you have to park across the street or up the block in spots reserved for Monte Carlo guests. My friend and I returned from Midway Casino at 3:00 a.m. only to find that all of Monte Carlo's designated parking was full. Therefore, we had to pay for on the street parking. Donald, the hotel manager on duty, refused to reimburse us the $2.50 we paid to park. Maid service was horrible. We did not receive any service on Sunday and had to request service on Monday. We did not recieve fresh bed linens and we had to ask for maid service to return to our room for a second time to clean the jacuzzi and the bathroom. The mattress was horrible to sleep on as well. The indoor pool advertised is farsical. It is extremely small and resembles a kiddie pool. Maybe large enough to accomodate 6-8 kids at a time. We asked for an 8:30 a.m. wake-up call that we received at 8:45 a.m. Shop around before selecting the Monte Carlo. I will never stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Probably Not Again”
Reviews.Author: babs550
Reviews.Content: I will first say the rooms were very clean and the staff was very friendly. Would I recommend this hotel to anyone? No, we got an efficiency and we had a fridge, microwave and a small coffee pot. No utensils, no cups, plates no dish soap or anything else that comes in an efficiency in other hotels. SO I would not recommend it for any family vacation unless you want to bring all those extra things. You got one complimentary pack of coffee and if you wanted any more you had to purchase it from the office, that never happened to me before. The free samples of soaps and shampoos you can get at the vending machine for 1.25. There are charges for everything, calling room to room local calls and a rule book with all other kinds of charges. If you smoke make sure your balcony door is shut all the way because if your room smells like smoke there is a 300.00 cleaning fee charged to your account. There are no extra pillows or blankets for the sofa bed. The pipes leaked. I might stay again if I was just passing through for the night and thats it. I will not pay that price in season or out of season for a motel like that expecially so close to the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “Never again!!”
Reviews.Author: OneBunches
Reviews.Content: As soon as we arrived we started having problems....we had to argue with the front desk in order to get our AAA discount that they had promised when we made the reservation. Parking was terrible. The parking spaces were not only spaced too close together, but the lot was across the street or two blocks away. We left with our vehicle being dented. The lobby was very small and there was only one, slow elevator. It was quicker to take the stairs! Our room was only made up once out of a three night stay, and the bathroom was never cleaned. We were awakened each morning at 6:00 am by the garbage pick up underneath our balcony! The pool was too cold, the jaccuzi was too hot, and the indoor heated pool was too small. The worse part of our trip was discovering that there were nicer hotels in the same area that had lower rates! Next year we will be staying at one of them!

Reviews.Title: “Not even a little like I was afraid it would be”
Reviews.Author: Mom2gkj
Reviews.Content: We recently got back from our vacation of 4 nights at Monte Carlo. We stayed August 21-25, so being the end of the month may have made it a little less crowded, I don't know. I have to admit that I started to get scared reading all the reviews, even though I know that you can't please all the people all the time, and some people never, I got worried. I was very pleasantly surprised when we got there. Yes, the lobby is VERY small, and the elevator was ridiculously slow, we actually used the stairs mostly even being on the 5th floor. But the room was very clean, and although standing out on the balcony did not give us a direct, full view of the ocean ( we were on the side that overlooked City Hall) we got a pleasing view of the ocean and the bay! I enjoyed sitting out there every day and night watching boats in the bay and seeing the ocean/boardwalk to the right. We had vacationed to Ocean City before but were up around 43rd street, and I would never go back that far up again. We LOVED being so close to the boardwalk, the food, the whole scene. If we hadn't taken 1 day trip to Assateague, we would never have used the car. We did not at any time have a problem parking in the lot directly across the hotel. There was always a few vacant spots. We even had a woman come to ask if she could inspect to be sure the maid was doing her job, which she did. The rooftop pool is on a concrete slab, as someone stated before, but I am unsure what else it would be on? It was nice, clean, and the kids loved the pool. We loved to hear the live music drift up at night too. The indoor pool was small, very small, almost comical, but the kids used it once during a rainy afternoon and enjoyed it. Overall, the staff was very friendly, the place was clean, the location was perfect, and my fears were unfounded. I do admit, another elevator would be very nice, or even one that moved faster than a snail, but we liked the exercise after stuffing ourselves with funnel cake and fries all day. We would return again, probably without the kids since they were the only miserable part of the week!

Reviews.Title: “Stay somewhere else”
Reviews.Author: Deb0413
Reviews.Content: The Hotel Monte Carlo was advertised as the newest hotel on the boardwalk, but the only thing new was the name. Everything in the hotel was very old and in need of updating and repair. There was only one small elevator for the entire hotel, the lobby was very small and not air conditioned. Our room was out dated as well as dirty upon our arrival, which did not improve as the days went on, our bed was only made once and the bathroom was never cleaned. The indoor and outdoor pools were both very cloudy to the point that my children could not use their dive sticks because they could not see them on the bottom of the pool. The only redeeming quality about the hotel was the location, the location was great that is why we stayed at the hotel and did not check out as soon as we arrived, as well as there were no vacancies in any of the hotels in the same area.

Reviews.Title: “It was like paying 20 dollars for gas and getting two dollars worth.”
Reviews.Author: yadash
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from the Monte Carlo. My family of four along with another family of four went on the trip. We were ther from Aug. 5th to 7th. We were very disappointed with the place based on what we paid and what the internet site showed about the hotel. If you look at the site, don't believe the description about the place or the pictures. They are very deceiving. We arrived late on Saturday night and was greeted by the smell of hoagies in the closet size lobby. There is a Subway shop on the other side of the lobby. After registering, I was given a map to try to find the other parking lots. There are only few spaces available at the hotel. Well, I finally found the lot that was about two blocks away. Being two blocks away is not that much of a problem, but finding the lot was very difficult because you had to go through a dark alley to find the place. Walking up to my room, I knew that this was not the same place that was advertised on the internet because the outside was not well kept, a bit dirty and run down. The room was very dingy.
